T02D3141:94b-1: nishpanna yo ga aa b'a li n'a ma /
T02D3141:94b-3: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T02D3141:94b-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3141:94b-5: rdo rje can gang 'di yi 'od kyis 'gro ba long byed mun rnams las rgyal byed //
T02D3141:94b-6: gang zhig gnas skabs mthar thug dbyer med dpal ldan yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes pa dang /
T02D3141:94b-7: gang gi snying rje'i tshogs kyi bdud rtsis rab tu brlan pa'i thugs kyis shin tu spros pa ste //
T02D3141:94b-8: de dag rnams kyis spyod pa rmad byung 'di bsten shes rab rang bzhin khyed las myur gyur cig //
T02D3141:94b-9: rdo rje phreng bas brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir //
T02D3141:94b-10: rdo rje 'chang spyod shin tu mdzes pa yis //
T02D3141:94b-11: sna tshogs skyes pa sprul pa'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02D3141:94b-12: myur du don yod phun sum tshogs par shog /'dir
T02D3141:94b-13: ni chung du dang 'bring po dag gi rim pas
T02D3141:94b-14: ting nge 'dzin legs par bsgoms pa las shes rab
T02D3141:95a-0: @95a * // bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba dang bsdu ba'i byed pa po //
T02D3141:95a-1: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
T02D3141:95a-2: ye shes skad cig gis rdzogs pa //
T02D3141:95a-3: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
T02D3141:95a-5: de yang bdag dang sems can thams cad rdo rje
T02D3141:95a-6: 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'dod pa'i spro ba dang
T02D3141:95a-7: ldan pas / phung po dang khams dang skye mched
T02D3141:95a-8: la sogs pa gzugs brnyan lta bur stong pa nyid
T02D3141:95a-9: dang ro gcig par nges par byas nas /
T02D3141:95a-10: 'od rab tu gsal ba la rab tu zhugs te /
T02D3141:95a-11: skad cig gi yan lag dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas
T02D3141:95a-12: khang gi dbus su dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor pas
T02D3141:95a-13: yongs su bskor ba'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang
T02D3141:95a-14: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i sku stong pa
T02D3141:95a-15: nyid dang / snying rje ro gcig pa'i bde ba
T02D3141:95a-16: chen po'i rang bzhin rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan
T02D3141:95a-17: cing thugs ka'i sa bon dang ldan pa la de
T02D3141:95a-21: khro bo la sogs pa dpag tu med pa spros te /
T02D3141:95a-22: ji ltar gzhan la phan par nus pa'i chos ston
T02D3141:95a-23: pa la sogs pas gzhan bsod nams kyi tshogs mthar
T02D3141:95a-25: bsdu ba byas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i skur bskyed par bya'o //
T02D3141:95a-26: de la 'di'i yan lags sogs pa ni sa 'og
T02D3141:95a-27: gi mthar thug par ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i
T02D3141:95a-28: rgyar / gcig tu sra zhing mkhregs la 'bar ba'i
T02D3141:95a-29: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis sa gzhi dang bskal pa'i
T02D3141:95a-30: mtha'i me 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang
T02D3141:95a-31: ldan pas mtshams bcing ba dang /
T02D3141:95a-32: sa 'og nas steng gi bar du shin tu mtho
T02D3141:95a-33: zhing mkhregs la sra zhing 'bar ba'i rdo rje ra
T02D3141:95a-34: ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba'i steng du bar
T02D3141:95a-35: mtshams med par dum bu gcig tu gyur cing steng
T02D3141:95a-36: du rdo rje'i mda'i dra ba dang /
T02D3141:95a-37: 'og tu rdo rje'i bla res brgyan pa'i rdo rje'i gur 'bar ba'o //
T02D3141:95a-38: de'i nang du gnas pa'i sna chogs chu skyes dang
T02D3141:95a-39: nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa
T02D3141:95a-40: ser po g-yas skor du 'khor ba'o //
T02D3141:95a-41: de'i shar gyi rtsibs ya gshin rje mthar byed nag po /
T02D3141:95a-42: zhal dkar po dang dmar po rdo rje'i tho ba
T02D3141:95a-43: nag po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma
T02D3141:95a-44: 'dzin pa'o // lho'i rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po zhal nag po dang dmar po /
T02D3141:95a-45: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dgar po dang /
T02D3141:95b-0: nub @95b kyi rtsibs la padma mthar byed dmar po zhal sngon po dang dkar po /
T02D3141:95b-1: padma dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:95b-2: byang gi rtsibs la bgegs mthar byed nag po zhal
T02D3141:95b-3: dkar po dang dmar po khro bo'i rdo rje dang
T02D3141:95b-4: ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:95b-5: mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po zhal dkar po dang dmar po /
T02D3141:95b-6: lcags kyu dang ral gri dang nor bu dang mtsho skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:95b-7: bden bral du dbyug pa sngon po nag po zhal
T02D3141:95b-8: dkar po dang dmar po dbyug pa sngon po dang
T02D3141:95b-9: ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:95b-10: // rlung du stobs po che nag po zhal dkar po dang dmar po /
T02D3141:95b-11: rtse gsum pa dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D3141:95b-12: dbang ldan du mi g-yo ba sngon po zhal dkar
T02D3141:95b-13: po dang dmar po ral gri dang nor bu dang
T02D3141:95b-14: padma 'dzin pa'o // steng du gtsug tor 'khor los
T02D3141:95b-15: sgyur ba ser po zhal sngon po dang dmar po
T02D3141:95b-16: padma 'dzin pa'o // / 'khor lo ser po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:95b-17: 'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po sngon po zhal dkar
T02D3141:95b-18: po dang dmar po rdo rje dang ral gri dang
T02D3141:95b-19: nor bu dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D3141:95b-20: de la gtsug tor dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang
T02D3141:95b-21: mi g-yo ba dang gnod mdzes rnams ni rin po
T02D3141:95b-23: rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par gyur pa /
T02D3141:95b-24: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ston pa ;
T02D3141:95b-26: de las gzhan pa rnams ni mi sdug pa'i gzugs
T02D3141:95b-27: can smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pas dbu skra
T02D3141:95b-28: dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3141:95b-29: smin ma dang sma ra dmar ser dang bcas pa /
T02D3141:95b-34: drag po'i klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa sku bong thung zhing rags pa lto ba 'phyang ba'o //
T02D3141:95b-35: bcu po 'di dag ni g-yon brkyang ba g-yas bskum
T02D3141:95b-36: pas rtsibs kyi rtse mo la cung zad ma reg
T02D3141:95b-38: nye ma'i gdan dang bcas pa brtan par gnas pa /
T02D3141:95b-39: nyi ma'i 'od can shin tu khros pa dang 'bar
T02D3141:95b-40: bas shin tu 'jigs pa bskal pa 'jig pa'i dus
T02D3141:95b-41: kyi me lta bu'i 'od dang ldan pa'i rang gi
T02D3141:95b-42: sku'i sprul ba dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis kyang
T02D3141:95b-43: khams gsum mtha' yas pa na gnas ba'i bgegs kyi
T02D3141:95b-44: tshogs ma lus pa yang dang yang du brlag par
T02D3141:96a-0: byed pa phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i @96a * //
T02D3141:96a-1: phyag dag gis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D3141:96a-2: zhal gsum pa khyad par du rtsa ba'i zhal gyi mdog ni sku mdog lta bu ste /
T02D3141:96a-3: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa yi ni gong du brjod do //
T02D3141:96a-4: zhal re re la'ang dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum mo //
T02D3141:96a-5: 'khor lo yang rgyun mi 'chad par drag tu 'khor
T02D3141:96a-6: bas brtan par gnas pa lta bur 'bar ba'i tshogs
T02D3141:96a-8: de'i lte ba'i nang du 'og gi rtsibs kyi steng
T02D3141:96a-9: du chos 'byung gru gsum dkar po shin tu yangs
T02D3141:96a-10: pa'i nang du 'og gi zur la gnas pa'i sna
T02D3141:96a-11: tshogs padma'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas
T02D3141:96a-12: pa'o // rdo rje de'i phyogs kyi ra rnams dang
T02D3141:96a-13: lte ba ni ji ltar rigs par rnam par snang
T02D3141:96a-14: mdzad la sogs pa'i mdog dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D3141:96a-15: der rin po che kha dog lnga las yongs su
T02D3141:96a-16: rdzogs pa thub pa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal
T02D3141:96a-17: ba phyogs kyi 'khor lo thams cad sna tshogs pa'i
T02D3141:96a-18: 'od zer gyis khyab pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D3141:96a-19: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
T02D3141:96a-20: dpa' 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sku gur gum gyi mdog
T02D3141:96a-21: lta bu g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal nag po dang
T02D3141:96a-22: dkar po / rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D3141:96a-23: ral gri dang mda' dang autpala dang gzhu 'dzin pa rin po che'i cod pan can no //
T02D3141:96a-24: rin po che sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D3141:96a-26: de'i shar gyi phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dkar
T02D3141:96a-27: po g-yas ba dang cig shos kyi zhal nag po
T02D3141:96a-28: dang dmar po phyag rnams na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
T02D3141:96a-30: ral gri dang nor bu dang padma'o //
T02D3141:96a-31: lhor rin chen 'byung ldan ser bo rin po che markat zur dgu pa dang /
T02D3141:96a-32: ral gri dang 'khor lo dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:96a-33: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar po padma dmar po dang ral gri dang nor bu dang /
T02D3141:96a-35: byang du don yod grub pa ljang gu ral gri
T02D3141:96a-36: dang 'khor lo dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:96a-37: // 'di gsum gyi g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni nag po dang dkar po'o //
T02D3141:96a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad rin po
T02D3141:96a-39: che'i cod pan dang ldan pa rin po che sna
T02D3141:96a-41: mer spyan ma rnam snang dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3141:96a-42: bden bral du m'a ma k'i mi bskyod pa lta bu autpala dmar po dang /
T02D3141:96b-0: ral gri dang nor bu dang padma @96b 'dzin pa ste /
T02D3141:96b-1: sgrub thabs thams cad las de ltar bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3141:96b-2: rlung du gos dkar mo snang ba mtha' yas dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3141:96b-3: dbang ldan du sgrol ma rin chen 'byung ldan lta
T02D3141:96b-4: bu autpala ser po dang ral gri dang nor bu
T02D3141:96b-6: dbus kyi rim pa las phyi rol du me'i mtshams
T02D3141:96b-7: su gzugs rdo rje ma rnam par snang mdzad lta
T02D3141:96b-8: bu rin po che'i me long dang ral gri dang
T02D3141:96b-9: nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:96b-10: srin por sgra rdo rje ma mi bskyod pa lta
T02D3141:96b-11: bu pi wang sngon po dang ral gri dang nor
T02D3141:96b-13: rlung du dri rdo rje ma rin chen 'byung ldan
T02D3141:96b-14: lta bu dri chab kyi dung ser po dang ral
T02D3141:96b-15: gri dang 'khor lo dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:96b-16: dbang ldan du rdo rje ma snang ba mtha' yas
T02D3141:96b-17: dang mtshungs pa ro'i snod dmar po dang ral gri
T02D3141:96b-18: dang nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:96b-19: shar sgo'i g-yon logs su reg bya rdo rje ma
T02D3141:96b-20: don yod grub pa dang mtshungs pa gos sna tshogs
T02D3141:96b-21: dang ral gri dang nor bu dang chu skyes 'dzin
T02D3141:96b-22: pa'o // shar sgo'i g-yas logs su chos kyi dbyings
T02D3141:96b-23: kyi rdo rje ma rdo rje sems dpa' dang mtshungs
T02D3141:96b-24: pa chos 'byung dkar po dang ral gri dang nor
T02D3141:96b-26: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams
T02D3141:96b-27: ni zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa phyag mtshan dang
T02D3141:96b-28: po gnyis ni g-yas pa dag gis so //
T02D3141:96b-29: gzhan gnyis ni g-yon pa dag gis 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:96b-30: thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku mdog bzhin no //
T02D3141:96b-31: shar la sogs pa'i sgo ru gshin rje mthar byed
T02D3141:96b-32: dang shes rab mthar byed dang padma mthar byed dang
T02D3141:96b-34: 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang rnam par snang mdzad dang
T02D3141:96b-35: lha mo bcu po rnams ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3141:96b-36: la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3141:96b-38: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'og tu sna tshogs padma'o //
T02D3141:96b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gtso bo'i phyag dag
T02D3141:96b-40: gis rang 'od kyi shes rab dag la 'khyud pa
T02D3141:96b-41: ste de bzhin du shes rab rnams 'od kyi thabs
T02D3141:96b-42: la'o // dbu la rigs kyi bdag po ste 'jam
T02D3141:96b-43: pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3141:96b-44: la'o // rnams dang / m'a ma k'i dang sgra rdo rje ma dang /
T02D3141:96b-45: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i khro bo brgyad la ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D3141:96b-46: spyan ma dang gzugs rdo rje ma dang gshin rje gshed rnams la ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D3141:97a-0: dri rdo rje ma la ni rin @97a * //
T02D3141:97a-2: gos dkar mo dang ro rdo rje ma dang padma mthar byed rnams la 'od dpag med do //
T02D3141:97a-3: sgrol ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma la ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D3141:97a-4: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma la ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:97a-6: 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' ni sku mdog dkar po
T02D3141:97a-7: la cung zad dmar po'i mdangs dang ldan pa g-yas
T02D3141:97a-8: pa dang cig shos kyi zhal ni sngon po dang
T02D3141:97a-9: dmar po gtso bo'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi
T02D3141:97a-10: shes rab la 'khyud pa rdo rje sngon po dang
T02D3141:97a-11: ral gri dang nor bu dang padma 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:97a-13: zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs
T02D3141:97a-14: pa zla ba'i mdog can rin po che'i cod pan
T02D3141:97a-15: dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dbul mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D3141:97a-16: 'dir 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs kar dam tshig sems
T02D3141:97a-17: dpa' lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' de'i thugs kar
T02D3141:97a-18: zla bar ral gri'i yu ba la gnas pa'i sa
T02D3141:97a-19: bon mam ngo // rtag pa dang rin 'byung dang /
T02D3141:97a-20: 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa dang mi
T02D3141:97a-21: bskyod pa rnams kyi thugs kar phyag mtshan la ji
T02D3141:97a-29: spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams la l'am m'am p'am t'am /
T02D3141:97a-30: dza: h'um bam ho: kham ram mam /
T02D3141:97a-31: khro bo rnams la h'um ngo //
T02D3141:97a-32: lha thams cad kyi snying po'i sngags ni rdo rje'i phreng bar bshad do ;
T02D3141:97a-33: /'dir rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor du mig la sogs pa
T02D3141:97a-34: byin gyis brlab pa dang ye shes sems dpa' dgug
T02D3141:97a-35: gzhug la sogs pa ni ma bshad do //
T02D3141:97a-36: de med kyang mig gi mngon par shes pa la
T02D3141:97a-37: sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med cing
T02D3141:97a-38: bsam gyis mi khyab pas mdzes par byas pa'i yi
T02D3141:97a-39: dam gyi lha'i sku cig car kho na la legs
T02D3141:97a-40: par yongs su dag cing rnam pa thams ca yongs
T02D3141:97a-41: su rdzogs par rgyun du yang dang yang lhag par
T02D3141:97a-43: snying po'i sngags la sogs pa bstan pa ni bum
T02D3141:97a-44: pa lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa la nye
T02D3141:97a-46: gang gi tshe dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan
T02D3141:97a-47: gtso bor gyur pa de'i dbus su gnas pa gzhan
T02D3141:97a-49: 'od dpag med dkar por yang 'gyur te /
T02D3141:97a-50: chos rnams dkar po'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D3141:97a-51: 'dir ni ngag gi dbang phyug dkar //
T02D3141:97a-53: 'di dang 'chad pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su gang gi
T02D3141:97b-0: dkyil @97b 'khor ba'i lha'i gtso bo'i gnas gang du
T02D3141:97b-1: bshad pa de nyid du gtso bo de dkyil 'khor
T02D3141:97b-2: gyi dbang po la mngon par phyogs shing de dang
T02D3141:97b-3: 'khyud pa ni de la mngon du phyogs pa nyid
T02D3141:97b-4: de gzhan gyi gnas su phyin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3141:97b-5: 'dir ni gzhal yas khang gi yan lag rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D3141:97b-6: rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i rdo rje'i gur dang /
T02D3141:97b-9: de la rdo rje'i gur ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzhal yas khang thams cad la'o //
T02D3141:97b-11: chos 'byung ni 'ga' zhig kho na la 'chad do //
T02D3141:97b-12: bri bar bya ba'i gzhal yas khang rnams la ni
T02D3141:97b-13: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo chos 'byung ngam chos
T02D3141:97b-14: kyi dbyings kyi khongs su chud par mtshon pa'i ched
T02D3141:97b-15: du rdo rje phreng ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D3141:97b-16: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang /
T02D3141:97b-17: zhes pas rdzogs rim gyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par bya
T02D3141:97b-18: ba'i ched du 'jig rten khams kyi 'khor yug mtshon
T02D3141:97b-19: pa'i phyir rdo rje phreng ba bri ba ni nges
T02D3141:97b-20: par ro // 'dir srung pa'i 'khor lo ni de ltar ma yin pas bri mi dgos te /
T02D3141:97b-21: bgegs bzlog pa ni gzhan gyis kyang byed pas so //
T02D3141:97b-22: gzhan yang stong pa nyid kho na /
T02D3141:97b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bgegs kyi tshogs ma lus pa
T02D3141:97b-24: rtsa ba dang bcas pa brlag par byed pa'i nus
T02D3141:97b-26: de la lhag par mos pa brtan pa nyid bskyed
T02D3141:97b-27: pa'i ched du bri ba'i dkyil 'khor la srung ba'i
T02D3141:97b-28: 'khor lo bri bar ma bstan to //
T02D3141:97b-29: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor la yang kha cig tu bsgom
T02D3141:97b-30: par gsungs pa las thams ca du ma yin no
T02D3141:97b-31: // bgegs bsal ba'i rjes la stong pa nyid la
T02D3141:97b-32: rab tu zhugs pas bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3141:97b-33: la srung pa'i 'khor lo med de de'i phyir mi
T02D3141:97b-34: 'dra'o zhe na de ltar na khor yug mtshon pa'i
T02D3141:97b-35: rdo rje'i ra ba yang mi 'dri bar 'gyur ro
T02D3141:97b-36: // // yan na gzhal yas khang bskyed pa'i dus su de yang bskyed do zhe na /
T02D3141:97b-38: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje ra ba lan gsum bskyed par ni gang nas kyang ma gsungs so //
T02D3141:97b-39: lan gnyis bskyed pas ci zhig bya cig car rdzogs
T02D3141:97b-40: pa nyid kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang mtshams bcing
T02D3141:97b-41: ba dang rdo rje'i ra ba la sogs kun brtags
T02D3141:97b-42: mtha' dag stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i
T02D3141:97b-43: ngo bor gnas pa nyid do //
T02D3141:97b-44: des ni srung ba'i 'khor lo yod kyang dkyil 'khor

T02D3141:98a-1: cig ni kha cig la srung ba'i 'khor lo bri
T02D3141:98a-2: bar bya'o zhes 'dod do zhes bya ba ni 'jam
T02D3141:98a-5: // / bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D3141:98a-6: ni gzhal yas khang gi bar du snga ma bzhin
T02D3141:98a-7: no // khro bo rnams kyi khyad par ni bshad par bya'o //
T02D3141:98a-8: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su mi bskyod pa nag
T02D3141:98a-9: po drag po g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal
T02D3141:98a-10: dkar po dang dmar po phyag g-yas pa rnams ni
T02D3141:98a-11: khro bo'i rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma bsnams
T02D3141:98a-12: pa / g-yon pa rnams ni dril bu dang yid
T02D3141:98a-13: bzhin gyi nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa rang
T02D3141:98a-14: dang 'dra ba'i reg bya rdo rje ma la 'khyud
T02D3141:98a-15: pa / pa'o // de'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs
T02D3141:98a-16: rnams su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang
T02D3141:98a-17: pa / pa'o // / me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D3141:98a-18: de la rnam par snang mdzad ni zhi ba dkar po'o //
T02D3141:98a-19: zhal dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po 'khor
T02D3141:98a-20: lo dang rdo rje dang padma dkar po dang dril
T02D3141:98a-21: bu dang nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:98a-22: bshad zin pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag mtshan
T02D3141:98a-23: dang po nas rim pa bzhin du phyag g-yas par
T02D3141:98a-25: g-yon par 'og nas steng du rig par bya'o //
T02D3141:98a-26: rin chen 'byung ldan ni ser po ste zhal ser po dang nag po dang dkar po'o //
T02D3141:98a-27: zhal gyi mdog gsum ni rim pa bzhin du rtsa ba dang g-yas pa dang g-yon yin no //
T02D3141:98a-28: nor bu dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang /
T02D3141:98a-29: dril bu dang padma ser po dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:98a-30: snang ba mtha' yas dmar po zhal dmar po dang
T02D3141:98a-31: nag po dang dkar po phyag g-yon pas dril bu
T02D3141:98a-32: dang bcas pa'i padma dmar po'i yu ba thugs kar
T02D3141:98a-33: bzung ba ; phyag g-yas pas kha 'byed pa'o //
T02D3141:98a-34: gzhan rnams kyis rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang /
T02D3141:98a-36: don yod grub pa ni ljang gu zhal gu ljang
T02D3141:98a-37: gu dang nag po dang dkar po ral gri dang
T02D3141:98a-38: sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang dril bu
T02D3141:98a-39: dang padma ljang gu dang nor bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:98a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po 'di dang 'chad par
T02D3141:98a-41: 'gyur ba'i kun du bzang po'i bar ni ral pa'i
T02D3141:98a-42: thor cog dang rin po che'i cod pan dang rin
T02D3141:98a-43: po che la sogs pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan
T02D3141:98a-44: pa'o // spyan ma ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02D3141:98a-45: 'on kyang padma dkar po'i gnas su autpala dkar po'o //
T02D3141:98b-0: m'a ma k'i ni mi bskyod pa lta bu @98b
T02D3141:98b-1: ste 'on kyang padma'i gnas su autpala sngon dmar ro
T02D3141:98b-2: // gos dkar mo ni snang ba mtha' yas dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3141:98b-3: sgrol ma ni don yod grub pa lta bu sna
T02D3141:98b-4: tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang autpala sdo ser
T02D3141:98b-5: dang dril bu dang nor bu rin po che dang
T02D3141:98b-7: rim pa gnyis par me'i mtshams su gzugs rdo rje
T02D3141:98b-8: ma spyan ma lta bu ste 'on kyang dang po'i
T02D3141:98b-9: phyag dag gis me long dmar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:98b-10: bden bral du sgra rdo rje ma ser mo zhal
T02D3141:98b-11: ser po dang nag po dang dkar po dang ldan
T02D3141:98b-12: pa rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis pi wang sngon mo
T02D3141:98b-13: bsgring [?] ba'o // phyag lhag ma dag gis rdo
T02D3141:98b-14: rje dang autpala sngon mo dang rin po che dang
T02D3141:98b-16: / rlung du dri rdo rje ma ni gos dkar
T02D3141:98b-17: mo lta bu rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis dri'i dung
T02D3141:98b-19: dbang ldan du ro rdo rje ma ljang gu zhal
T02D3141:98b-20: ljang gu dang nag po dang dkar po phyag dang

T02D3141:98b-23: / rim pa gsum pa'i shar gyi snam bu la byams pa dang sa'i snying po'o //
T02D3141:98b-24: lho'i snam bu la phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02D3141:98b-25: nub kyi snam bu la spyan ras gzigs dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs so //
T02D3141:98b-26: byang du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang kun du bzang po'o //
T02D3141:98b-27: brgyad po 'di dag ni rang gi rigs kyi bdag po dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02D3141:98b-28: 'on kyang byams pa ni rtsa ba'i phyag gis 'khor
T02D3141:98b-29: los mtshan pa'i yal ga dang bcas pa'i klu shing
T02D3141:98b-31: shar la sogs pa'i sgo dang me la sogs pa'i
T02D3141:98b-32: mtshams dang steng dang 'og tu go rims bzhin du
T02D3141:98b-33: khro bo bcu'o // de la gshin rje gshed ni

T02D3141:98b-37: dril bu dang dgra stva 'dzin pa'o //

T02D3141:98b-39: rdo rje dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang /
T02D3141:98b-40: ral gri dang thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D3141:98b-41: sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:98b-42: // padma mthar byed ni dmar po zhal dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po /
T02D3141:98b-43: padma dmar po dang ral gri dang gtun shing dang dril bu dang /

T02D3141:99a-9: 'dzin pa gzhan rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri
T02D3141:99a-10: dang zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //

T02D3141:99a-16: nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po rdo rjes

T02D3141:99a-18: 'khor lo dang thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D3141:99a-19: sdigs mdzub dang padma dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o //

T02D3141:99a-22: phyag lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje dang padma dang sdigs mdzub dang ral gri rnams 'dzin pa'o //

T02D3141:99a-26: gnyis brkyang ngo // de bzhin du gung mo gnyis

T02D3141:99a-40: po dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang
T02D3141:99a-41: rdo rje dang padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang
T02D3141:99b-0: klu shing gi me tog dang 'khor lo dang @99b
T02D3141:99b-1: rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02D3141:99b-2: padma dang rdo rje dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang
T02D3141:99b-3: rdo rje dang thob dang rdo rje dang padma dmar
T02D3141:99b-4: po dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang ral gri'i yu
T02D3141:99b-5: ba dang rdo rje dang rdo rjes mchan pa'i dbyug
T02D3141:99b-6: pa sngon po dang dbyug pa nag po dang rdo
T02D3141:99b-7: rje dang rdo rje la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang
T02D3141:99b-8: zla ba la bzhugs pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o
T02D3141:99b-9: ; / yang gzhan nas ni rang rang gi lha'i mdog lta bu'i rin po che las byas pa'o //
T02D3141:99b-10: de la rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo rnams
T02D3141:99b-11: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams zla ba la gnas

T02D3141:99b-13: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje'i skyil krung can no //
T02D3141:99b-14: khro bo rnams ni zhabs g-yon brkyang pa g-yas bskum
T02D3141:99b-15: pa zhal so so la dmar la zlum pa'i spyan
T02D3141:99b-16: gsum gsum mnga' ba sgra sgrogs shing 'bar ba ste

T02D3141:99b-28: sna tshogs rin chen ma dang /

T02D3141:99b-35: rnam par snang mdzad kyi aom /

T02D3141:99b-45: rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa dang kun

T02D3141:99b-48: 'on kyang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang /

T02D3141:100a-6: gnod mdzes rgyal po rnams kyi ni mi bskyod pa'o ;

T02D3141:103a-1: rtsa ba'i zhal khro zhing gad rgyangs dang bcas pa /

T02D3141:106b-34: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo lta bu rin po che

T02D3141:106b-36: ; / me tog ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis

T02D3141:107a-32: // gtsug gi 'khor lo dang rna cha dang mgul
T02D3141:107a-33: rgyan dang lag gdub dang ska rags dang thal ba

T02D3141:107b-0: rkang gdub la sogs @107b pas brgyan pa'o //

T02D3141:107b-2: tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po
T02D3141:107b-3: dang drag po'i snying ga'i steng du zla ba rnams
T02D3141:107b-4: la goo r'i la sogs pa'o //
T02D3141:107b-5: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab mar gnas pa'i gshin rje dang lus ngan dang srin po dang /
T02D3141:107b-6: thags bzangs ris kyi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i pukka s'i la sogs pa'o //
T02D3141:107b-7: de la goo r'i nag mo g-yas na gri gug g-yon na ro hi ta'i nya 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:107b-8: tsoo r'i dmar mo g-yas da ma ru g-yon phag pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:107b-9: ro langs ma gser gyi mdog can g-yas g-yon gyi
T02D3141:107b-10: phyag gnyis kyis rus sbal dang padma'i snod 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:107b-11: ; / ghasma r'i ljang gu phyag g-yas pa na

T02D3141:107b-13: ; // pukka s'i sngon mo phyag g-yas pa na seng ge g-yon pa na dgra sta 'dzin pa'o //

T02D3141:107b-15: canda l'i nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs ma phyag g-yas

T02D3141:107b-19: khyad par gzhan ni sngar brjod pa'i bdag med ma bzhin no //

T02D3141:107b-22: dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan

T02D3141:107b-24: pukka s'i la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo //

T02D3141:108a-14: kye'i rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //

T02D3141:108a-18: zhes pa ni phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D3141:108a-19: aom dzva la dzva la bhyo h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3141:108a-21: aom ki ti ki ti badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3141:108a-23: aom a'a: badzra ghasma r'i aom h'um sv'a h'a zhes
T02D3141:108a-24: bya ba ni ghasma r'i'i sngags te las thams cad
T02D3141:108a-26: / sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje

T02D3141:108b-9: ljang gu'i zhal sna tshogs padma dang mda' dang thod pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:108b-10: byang du sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu dang
T02D3141:108b-11: ser po dang dkar po dang sngon po'i zhal lo

T02D3141:108b-13: thams cad kyang phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D3141:108b-14: zla ba'i gdan la 'od dang ldan pa'o //

T02D3141:108b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D3141:108b-17: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyang go rims ji ltar rnam snang dang /

T02D3141:108b-19: gi dbang phyug dang don yod grub pa rnams so

T02D3141:108b-21: aom h'um h'um snying po'i sngags so //
T02D3141:108b-22: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang aom aom h'um /
T02D3141:108b-27: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni las thams cad pa'o /
T02D3141:108b-29: // / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa lha dgu'i
T02D3141:108b-30: bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi
T02D3141:108b-31: nang gi chos 'byung la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang
T02D3141:108b-32: gi dbus su sna tshogs padma'o //

T02D3141:108b-34: la shes rab ma dang bral ba'i bcom ldan 'das
T02D3141:108b-35: sku mdog la sogs pa phyi nas 'chad pa'i 'khor
T02D3141:108b-36: lo gsum la gnas pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thod pa

T02D3141:108b-40: ma dang legs bzangs mo rnams ni sku mdog sngon

T02D3141:108b-43: dang thod pa g-yon gnyis kyis kha tv'am dang da

T02D3141:108b-47: mo dang phyag bzhi ma dang nam mkha' la gnas

T02D3141:109a-5: g-yon gnyis kyis kha tvam ga dang padma'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:109a-6: brgyad po 'di dag kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D3141:109a-7: gar gyi tshul gyis gnas pa dbu skra ser po
T02D3141:109a-9: dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa

T02D3141:109a-12: cung zad gtsigs pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa spyan
T02D3141:109a-13: gsum pa'o // bcom lan 'das la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas lngas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D3141:109a-14: sna tshogs ldem la sogs pa rnams la mi bskyod
T02D3141:109a-15: pa dang rnam snang dang rin 'byung dang snang mtha'
T02D3141:109a-16: rnams kyis so // chang 'tshong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yang de dag rnams so //
T02D3141:109a-17: yang na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang phyogs kyi lha
T02D3141:109a-18: mo rnams kyang mdog dkar mo mtshams kyi lha mo

T02D3141:109a-20: dang bcas pa'o // rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil
T02D3141:109a-21: 'khor la rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung
T02D3141:109a-22: gi dbus su gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D3141:109a-23: de'i dbus su sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i steng
T02D3141:109a-24: du 'jigs byed dang dus mchan g-yon bskum g-yas brkyang

T02D3141:109a-26: ba'i bcom ldan 'das khro bo ni bskal pa 'jig
T02D3141:109a-27: dus me lta bu'i 'od zer 'bar zhing 'gro ba
T02D3141:109a-28: ma lus pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad rab tu
T02D3141:109a-29: bsal bar mdzad pa sku mdog sngon po dang ser
T02D3141:109a-30: po dang ljang gu'i zhal rtsa ba dang g-yas dang
T02D3141:109a-31: g-yon gyi mi sdug pa gdangs pa /

T02D3141:109a-33: ba 'jigs su rung ba'i zhal gsum pa re re
T02D3141:109a-34: zhing spyan gsum pa dmar la zlum pa smin ma

T02D3141:109a-41: klu padma chen po padma'i rtsa ba lta bu dkar pos mgul rgyan byas pa /
T02D3141:109b-0: klu karko ta d'ur ba lta bu ljang @109b gus
T02D3141:109b-1: mchod phyir thogs byas ba nor rgyas dkar pos ska
T02D3141:109b-2: rags byas pa / padma dkar po kun da'i med tog lta bur mdzes pas rkang gdub byas pa /
T02D3141:109b-3: dud skyong ser pos lag gdub byas pa /
T02D3141:109b-4: rigs ldan du ba lta bu khra bos dpung rgyan byas pa /
T02D3141:109b-5: rdo rje sems dpas dbu la rgyas btab pa /
T02D3141:109b-6: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis kyis 'jig
T02D3141:109b-7: rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas rang
T02D3141:109b-8: gi yum la snyoms par zhugs pa gang sa gnyis
T02D3141:109b-9: kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang g-yon gnyis kyis
T02D3141:109b-10: thod pa dang kha tvam ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:109b-11: 'di'i shar phyogs su rdo rje dbyug pa sngon po
T02D3141:109b-12: dang ser po dang ljang gu ni rtsa ba dang
T02D3141:109b-13: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal lo //
T02D3141:109b-14: g-yas pa gnyis kyis rdo rje thob dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gyen du 'phyar ba /
T02D3141:109b-15: g-yon pa gnyis kyis thod pa dang kha tvam ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:109b-16: byang du rdo rje nyi ma ser po ser po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo //
T02D3141:109b-17: khyad par du phyag dang pos rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:109b-18: khyad par du rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams kyang rdo rje dbyug pa lta bu'o //
T02D3141:109b-19: 'og nas 'chad pa rnams kyang rdo rje dbyug pa lta bu'o //
T02D3141:109b-20: 'og nas 'chad pa rnams kyang de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D3141:109b-21: byang du rdo rje gtsug tor dmar po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo //
T02D3141:109b-22: padma dmar pos mtshan pa'i phyag go //
T02D3141:109b-23: lhor rdo rje 'khyil ba ljang gu ni ljang gu dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal lo //
T02D3141:109b-24: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag go //
T02D3141:109b-25: mer rdo rje gnod sbyin du ba'i mdog du ba'i mdog dang ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo //
T02D3141:109b-27: srin por rdo rje bdud rtsi dmar po dmar po dang /
T02D3141:109b-28: ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal lo //
T02D3141:109b-30: rlung du nag po chen po sngon po dang ser
T02D3141:109b-31: po dang ljang gu'i zhal tri sh'u la 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:109b-32: // dbang ldan du rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba nag po nag po dang /
T02D3141:109b-33: ser po dang ljang gu'i zhal ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:109b-34: rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa brgyad po 'di
T02D3141:109b-35: rnams ni rim pa ji lta bar gshin rje mthar
T02D3141:109b-36: byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang padma mthar byed
T02D3141:109b-37: dang bgegs mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang
T02D3141:109b-38: / dbyug pa sngon po dang stobs po che dang mi g-yo ba rnams kyi ming gzhan no //
T02D3141:109b-39: steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur pa dkar po
T02D3141:109b-40: dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i zhal 'khor lo 'dzin
T02D3141:110a-1: 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og gnod mdzes kyi ming
T02D3141:110a-2: rnam grangs can sngon po sngon po dang ser po
T02D3141:110a-3: dang ljang gu'i zhal rol pa dang bcas pa'i rdo
T02D3141:110a-5: 'di'i phyag gnyis kyis klu'i zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa dang kha tv'am ga'o //
T02D3141:110a-6: rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa'i khro bo 'di
T02D3141:110a-7: rnams ni phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo dang thod pas
T02D3141:110a-8: mtshan pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang mtshungs pa'i yum
T02D3141:110a-10: dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du 'khyil ba
T02D3141:110a-11: rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos cod pan mdzes
T02D3141:110a-12: par brgyan pa smin ma g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i
T02D3141:110a-13: khro gnyer can mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal re re
T02D3141:110a-14: la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa dmar zhing zlum
T02D3141:110a-15: pa mi mgo'i phreng ba dang phyag rgya lnga la
T02D3141:110a-16: sogs pa dang klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa
T02D3141:110a-17: / sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D3141:110a-18: phyogs skyong brgyad dang steng du tshangs pa dang 'og
T02D3141:110a-19: tu thags bzangs ris rnams la g-yas brkyang gis mnan
T02D3141:110a-20: nas bzhugs pa rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos dbu
T02D3141:110a-21: / brgyan pa sta / ji ltar 'jam pa'i rdo
T02D3141:110a-22: rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsibs bcu pa'i srung pa'i 'khor
T02D3141:110a-24: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02D3141:110a-25: aom kha badzra dhrik badzra h'um ka ra badzra h'um
T02D3141:110a-26: phat ces bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi
T02D3141:110a-28: / las thams cad pa'i sngags ni aom badzra kunda li badzra h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3141:110a-30: yang shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang
T02D3141:110a-31: steng dang 'og tu sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i
T02D3141:110a-32: gdan rnams la g-yas skor gyis gshin rje mthar byed
T02D3141:110a-33: la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu'o //
T02D3141:110a-34: 'di rnams kyi gnas dang sku mdog la sogs pa
T02D3141:110a-35: bsdus pa'i rim par gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta
T02D3141:110a-36: ba bzhin no // yang na 'jam pa'i rdo rje srung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa bzhin no //
T02D3141:110a-37: yang na kun du kha sbyor gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
T02D3141:110a-38: phyogs 'di gsum ka la yang aom a'a: bigh'a takri
T02D3141:110a-39: ta h'um zhes bya bas bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags
T02D3141:110a-42: // / bde mchog ti dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur
T02D3141:110a-43: gyi nang du ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs
T02D3141:110a-44: padma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i
T02D3141:110a-45: lte ba la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus
T02D3141:110b-0: su sna tshogs padma'i lte ba'i steng du @110b nyi
T02D3141:110b-1: ma la gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mo
T02D3141:110b-2: g-yas brkyang gi zhabs gnyis kyis mnan pa'i bcom ldan
T02D3141:110b-3: 'das sku mdog nag po shar dang byang la sogs
T02D3141:110b-4: pa'i zhal bzhi nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar
T02D3141:110b-5: po dang ser po zhal re re la spyan gsum
T02D3141:110b-6: pa stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D3141:110b-7: phyag bcu gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu dang
T02D3141:110b-8: bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje phag mo la
T02D3141:110b-9: 'khyud pa / phyag gnyis kyis rgyab tu glang po
T02D3141:110b-10: che dkar po'i pags pa khrag dang bcas pa brgyangs
T02D3141:110b-11: 'khyud pa / nas 'dzin pa / de las gzhan
T02D3141:110b-12: pa'i g-yas pa'i phyag rnams kyis da ma ru dang
T02D3141:110b-13: dgra sta dang gri gug dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa
T02D3141:110b-15: kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha tv'am gdang khrag gis
T02D3141:110b-16: gang ba'i thod pa dang rdo rje zhags pa dang
T02D3141:110b-17: tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams so //
T02D3141:110b-18: mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul du 'phyang ba /
T02D3141:110b-19: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa'i mi'i rgyu mas mchod phyir thogs byas pa /
T02D3141:110b-20: dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D3141:110b-21: nor bu dang g-yon ngos su gnas pa'i zla ba
T02D3141:110b-22: phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral
T02D3141:110b-23: pa'i thod co gnag po rnam par 'gyur zhing gdangs
T02D3141:110b-24: pa / mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can gar gyi nyams dgu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3141:110b-25: rdo rje phag mo ni dmar mo zhal gcig phyag
T02D3141:110b-26: gnyis spyan gsum pa skra'i tshogs grol ba gcer bu
T02D3141:110b-27: thod pa'i dum bu'i ska gas bcings pa 'khyud pa'i
T02D3141:110b-28: phyag gis bzung ba'i thod pa khrag gis bkang ba
T02D3141:110b-29: 'dzag pa'i rgyun gtso bo la stob pa /
T02D3141:110b-30: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa rdo rje steng du 'phyar
T02D3141:110b-31: ba'i phyag g-yas pas gdug pa rnams la sdigs par
T02D3141:110b-32: byed pa khrag dang bral ba'i mi mgo skam po'i
T02D3141:110b-33: phreng ba can nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can
T02D3141:110b-34: / phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa cung zad bzhad
T02D3141:110b-35: pa zla mtshan 'bab pa dang bcas pa spu gyen
T02D3141:110b-36: / du langs pa'o // de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams la g-yon skor gyi dang /
T02D3141:110b-37: me la sogs pa'i phyogs bral rnams la g-yas skor gyis dgod do //
T02D3141:110b-38: de la phyogs kyi 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D3141:110b-41: gzugs can ma rnams ni nag mo dang ljang gu dang dmar mo dang /
T02D3141:110b-42: ser mo'i mdog can rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum
T02D3141:110b-43: pa dbu skra grol ba phyag bzhi ma g-yon pa
T02D3141:111a-2: g-yas pa dag gis da ma ru dang gri gug 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:111a-3: g-yas brkyang bas gnas pa rnams so //
T02D3141:111a-4: mtshams kyi 'dab mar byang chub kyi sems dang khrag
T02D3141:111a-5: dang bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga rnams grub pa'i
T02D3141:111a-6: bcud lta bu'i bdud rtsir gyur bas gang ba'i padma'i
T02D3141:111a-7: snod rnams so// yang na bzhi char yang bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'o //
T02D3141:111a-8: de nas thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs su thod pa'i dam bu dang rab tu gtum mo'o //
T02D3141:111a-9: byang du keng rus chen po dang gtum pa'i mig can ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-10: nub tu keng rus dang 'od ldan ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-11: lho ru mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-12: mer chang dgra ma dang dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-13: srin por 'od dpag med dang mi'u thung ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-14: rlung du rdo rje 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-15: dbang ldan du rdo rje'i lus dang shing grib ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-16: rim pa de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo la myu gu can dang sa srung ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-17: rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo'o ;
T02D3141:111a-18: / dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-19: rdo rje h'um mdzad dang chang 'thung ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-20: rdo rje bzang po dang lha mo sngo bsangs ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-21: rdo rje 'od dang shin tu bzang mo'o //
T02D3141:111a-22: 'jigs byed chen mo dang rta rna ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-23: mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-24: de bzhin du sku'i 'khor lo la stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-25: rin chen rdo rje dang dum skyes ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-27: nam mkha'i snying bo dang 'khor lo'i go cha 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:111a-28: dpal he ru ka dang shin tu bzang mo'o //
T02D3141:111a-29: padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma'o //
T02D3141:111a-30: rnam bar snang mdzad dang 'khor los sgyur ma'o ;
T02D3141:111a-31: / rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo'o //
T02D3141:111a-32: de la thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dpa'
T02D3141:111a-33: bo rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa ral pa'i
T02D3141:111a-34: thor tshugs can dpral bar gnas pa'i rdo rje phreng
T02D3141:111a-35: bas mtshan pa'i dpa' bo'i dar dpyangs can phyag bzhi
T02D3141:111a-36: pa 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang rdo
T02D3141:111a-37: rje dril bu g-yon pas kha tv'am ga dang g-yas
T02D3141:111a-38: pa da ma ru bsnams pa /
T02D3141:111a-39: tshangs pa'i skud pa dang dpung rgyan can mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal /
T02D3141:111a-40: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa'o //
T02D3141:111a-41: rab tu gtum mo la sogs ba'i lha mo rnams
T02D3141:111a-42: zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa drag po'i gzugs can
T02D3141:111b-0: ma @111b dbu skra grol ba'i gcer bu ma /
T02D3141:111b-1: phyag gnyis pa 'khyud pa'i phyag gis thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:111b-2: g-yas pa gdug pa rnams bsdigs pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:111b-3: sgo rnams la khva gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma
T02D3141:111b-4: dang khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma rnams ni
T02D3141:111b-5: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D3141:111b-6: khyad par du 'di rnams kyi zhal ni ming gi rjes su mthun pa'o //
T02D3141:111b-7: mtshams rnams su gshin rje brtan ma dang /
T02D3141:111b-8: gshin rje pho nya ma dang /
T02D3141:111b-9: gshin rje mche ba ma dang gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi'i zhal lo //
T02D3141:111b-10: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyogs kyi lha mo gnyis kyi g-yas dang g-yon gyi sku phyed phyed 'dra ba'o ;
T02D3141:111b-11: / brgyad po 'di rnams ni ro'i gdan can no //
T02D3141:111b-12: d'a ki ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni
T02D3141:111b-13: mi mgo'i phreng ba can rdo rje phreng bas dbral
T02D3141:111b-14: bar brgyan pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa ska
T02D3141:111b-15: rags la sgra dang bcas pa'i g-yer ga la sogs
T02D3141:111b-16: pas brgyan pa'o // rigs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D3141:111b-17: rdo rje phag mo'i rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D3141:111b-18: d'a ki ma la sogs pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02D3141:111b-19: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo gnas pa rnams
T02D3141:111b-20: ni mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang
T02D3141:111b-22: dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas pa rnams ni don yod grub ba'o ;
T02D3141:111b-23: / bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni h'um ngo //
T02D3141:111b-24: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02D3141:111b-25: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram sv'a h'a /
T02D3141:111b-27: aom khanda ro he h'um h'um phat ces bya ba
T02D3141:111b-28: ni dum skyes ma'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o
T02D3141:111b-29: // lha gzhan rnams kyi ni kho bos dpal bde
T02D3141:111b-30: mchog gi mngon par rtogs pa'i sgrub thabs su bshad
T02D3141:111b-31: // pa'o // yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la
T02D3141:111b-32: sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms ma'i bar thams cad
T02D3141:111b-33: ni zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa de la dba'
T02D3141:111b-34: bo nyi shu rtsa lngas 'khyud pa'i g-yas g-yon gyi
T02D3141:111b-35: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa
T02D3141:111b-36: // pa'o // / d'a ki ma la sogs pa
T02D3141:111b-37: bzhi dang khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni
T02D3141:111b-38: g-yon pas thod pa dang dpung pa la brten pa'i
T02D3141:111b-39: kha tv'am ga dang g-yas pa d'a ma ru 'dzin
T02D3141:111b-40: pa gzhan thams cad ni gong bzhin no //
T02D3141:111b-41: yang na 'dir 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa
T02D3141:111b-42: phyag gnyis pa nyid kyis phyogs la dpal bde mchog
T02D3141:112a-1: phag mo gnyis kyis gser gyi mdog gam sngon pos yang ste /
T02D3141:112a-2: bcom ldan 'das ni phyag g-yas pas rdo rje gsor
T02D3141:112a-3: ba la mchog tu brtson pa g-yon pas thod pa
T02D3141:112a-5: yang na rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pas gnas pa'o //
T02D3141:112a-6: d'a ki ma la sogs pa bzhi ni ser mo g-yas pa d'a ma ru 'dzin pa rnams so //
T02D3141:112a-7: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams nag po rdo
T02D3141:112a-8: rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa dpa' mo
T02D3141:112a-9: rnams dkar mo phyag g-yas pas rdo rje dang bcas
T02D3141:112a-10: pa'i sdigs mdzub can rnams so //
T02D3141:112a-11: gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dmar po padma dang padma'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:112a-12: d'a ki ma rnams ni nag mo phyag g-yas pa na padma dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
T02D3141:112a-13: sku'i 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dkar po 'khor lo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:112a-14: lha mo rnams ni dmar mo g-yas pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa rnams so //
T02D3141:112a-15: dpa' bo thams cad ni yum la 'khyud par brtson pa g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa rnams so //
T02D3141:112a-16: dpa' mo rnams ni de'i brla gnyis la 'khril ba'i tshul lo //
T02D3141:112a-17: khva gdong ma la sogs ba rnams ni g-yas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:112a-18: lha mo thams cad ni g-yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:112a-19: gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa ni g-yas pas
T02D3141:112a-20: d'a ma ru g-yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i
T02D3141:112a-22: d'a ki ma la sogs pa rnams dang khva gdong
T02D3141:112a-23: ma la sogs pa rnams kyi g-yon pa'i dpung pa
T02D3141:112a-25: bcu gnyis po 'di rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa'i
T02D3141:112a-26: gar gyis gnas pa khyad par gzhan thams cad ni
T02D3141:112a-27: gong bzhin no // 'di ni bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum mo /
T02D3141:112a-29: // / gang gi tshe 'di rnams la dpa' bo nyi
T02D3141:112a-30: shu rtsa lnga mi bsgom par rdo rje phag mo
T02D3141:112a-31: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gyur pa de'i tshe rdo
T02D3141:112a-32: rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor gsum mo //
T02D3141:112a-33: rdo rje phag mo'i snying ga'i sa bon ni bam mo //
T02D3141:112a-34: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um h'um phat ces pa ni snying po'o //
T02D3141:112a-35: bde mchog gi phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa lha
T02D3141:112a-36: 'di rnams kyi phyag g-yas su gnas pa'i phyag mtshan
