T02D3141:118b-10: slong dang gzhu dang pang du gnas pa'i bum pa
T02D3141:118b-11: rin po che 'bar ba 'bab pa can dang /
T02D3141:118b-12: sna tshogs rdo rje la rin po ches mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:118b-13: rim pa gnyis pa la me'i mtshams su nag po ni phyag gnyis kyis dung 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:118b-14: bden bral du dus mtshan ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o ;
T02D3141:118b-15: / rlung gi mtshams su rna ba nag mo dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis dgra sta 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:118b-16: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su dkar mo sku mdog dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:118b-17: bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D3141:118b-18: dgu po 'di dag ni ratna sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang gos dang rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D3141:118b-19: zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa rim pa
T02D3141:118b-20: ji lta ba bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan dang
T02D3141:118b-28: rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D3141:118b-29: shar la sogs pa'i sgor sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang /
T02D3141:118b-30: rdo rje zhags pa ma dang /
T02D3141:118b-31: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /
T02D3141:118b-32: rdo rje dril bu ma rnams kyi yang sngar bzhin no //
T02D3141:118b-33: so sor 'brang ma la sogs pa rnams kyis bon ni bram ngo //
T02D3141:118b-34: aom ma ni dha ri badzra ni ma h'a pra
T02D3141:118b-35: ti s'a re h'um h'um phat phat ces bya ba
T02D3141:118b-36: ni snying po'o // sa bon ni brum mo //
T02D3141:118b-37: aom a'a: ma h'a sa h'a sra pra ma rda ni br'um h'um snying po'o //
T02D3141:118b-39: aom a'a: ma h'a mantra aa nu s'a ri ni h'um h'um snying po'o //
T02D3141:118b-41: aom a'a: ma h'a shi ta ba ti badzri h'um snying po'o //
T02D3141:119a-1: m'a y'u ra bidya r'a dzny'a h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3141:119a-3: dgos ba'i dbang gis 'di rnams gang yang rung bas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ma bya'o //
T02D3141:119a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug ma'i snying po'i sngags kyis ni las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang bya'o //
T02D3141:119a-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur
T02D3141:119a-6: gyi nang du gling dang nye ba'i gling phran dang
T02D3141:119a-7: rgya mtsho dang ri bdun la sogs pas yongs su
T02D3141:119a-8: bskor ba'i ri rab kyi steng gzhal yas khang ste
T02D3141:119a-9: de'i dbus su seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs padma'i
T02D3141:119a-10: ze 'bru la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D3141:119a-11: dkar po rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa nyi
T02D3141:119a-12: ma'i 'od can / sangs rgyas lngas sbras pa'i ratna'i
T02D3141:119a-13: cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i ral pa'i thor cog can
T02D3141:119a-14: ratna sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang gos dang ldan pa
T02D3141:119a-15: zhi ba'i zhal bzhi dkar po dang ser po dang
T02D3141:119a-16: dmar po dang ljang gu dang /
T02D3141:119a-17: phyag brgyad pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa gnyis kyis
T02D3141:119a-18: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag
T02D3141:119a-19: rgya mdzad pa'o // gzhan gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:119a-20: g-yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:119a-21: g-yon pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:119a-22: yang na 'di ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku
T02D3141:119a-23: mdog dkar po rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub
T02D3141:119a-25: g-yon pa'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo langs
T02D3141:119a-26: pa la g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung
T02D3141:119a-27: ba byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D3141:119a-28: shar gyi 'dab ma la sems ma rdo rje ma
T02D3141:119a-29: sngon mo g-yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar
T02D3141:119a-30: po 'dzin pa g-yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa
T02D3141:119a-32: lhor rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo g-yas pas
T02D3141:119a-33: rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i rin po che
T02D3141:119a-34: 'dzin pa / g-yon pas sdig par byed pa'i sdigs mdzub po //
T02D3141:119a-35: nub tu chos kyi rdo rje ma dmar mo ni
T02D3141:119a-36: rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i padma 'dab ma
T02D3141:119a-37: brgyad pa dkar dmar g-yas pas 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:119a-39: byang du las kyi rdo rje ma ljang gu g-yas
T02D3141:119a-40: pa sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa
T02D3141:119a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog can 'dzin pa
T02D3141:119a-42: / g-yon pas sdigs mdzub sdigs par byed pa'o //
T02D3141:119b-0: de nas shar phyogs @119b su glang po che'i dbang
T02D3141:119b-1: po'i steng du sna tshogs padma'i lte bar mi bskyod
T02D3141:119b-2: pa sngon po rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas pa
T02D3141:119b-3: / phyag g-yas pa gung mos rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D3141:119b-4: pa sngon po bzung nas sa gnon gyi tshul byed
T02D3141:119b-5: cing phyag g-yon pa gan rkyal du pang du bzhag
T02D3141:119b-6: / pa'o // shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje sems
T02D3141:119b-7: dpa' dkar po phyag g-yas pa'i gung mos snying gar
T02D3141:119b-8: 'gying ba'i tshul gyis rdo rje gsor ba'i sbyor ba'o
T02D3141:119b-9: / pa'o // // g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur
T02D3141:119b-10: gyis nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i dril bu dkur brten
T02D3141:119b-11: / pa'o // // pa'o // lhor rdo rje rgyal
T02D3141:119b-12: po ser po g-yas par gnas pa'i rdo rje lcags
T02D3141:119b-13: kyus 'gugs pa'i tshul byed cing phyag g-yon pas zhags
T02D3141:119b-15: kha cig ni phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyu
T02D3141:119b-16: 'dzin pas 'gugs pa'i tshul byed pa'o zhes so //
T02D3141:119b-17: byang du rdo rje chags pa dmar po phyag g-yon
T02D3141:119b-18: dang cig shos rnam pa gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda'
T02D3141:119b-19: 'dzin pa'o // nub tu rdo rje legs pa margad
T02D3141:119b-20: kyi mdog lta bu rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag
T02D3141:119b-21: gnyis kyis snying gar legs so sbyin pa'i tshul byed
T02D3141:119b-22: 'dzin pa'o // pa'o // lhor rta'i rgyab tu sna
T02D3141:119b-23: tshogs padma'i lte bar rin chen 'byung ldan ser po
T02D3141:119b-24: rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3141:119b-25: g-yas pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che gung mos bzung ste mchod sbyin gyi tshul byed pa ;
T02D3141:119b-27: shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje rin chen ser po
T02D3141:119b-28: ni g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtha' gnyis
T02D3141:119b-29: la rdo rje gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i
T02D3141:119b-30: phreng ba rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'ching
T02D3141:119b-31: bar byed cing g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu snyems
T02D3141:119b-32: pa dang bcas pas dkur brten pa'o //
T02D3141:119b-33: lho ru rdo rje gzi brjid dmar po snying gar
T02D3141:119b-34: phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin pa'i nyi mas gsal bar byed
T02D3141:119b-35: pa'o // byang du rdo rje tog ljang gu g-yon
T02D3141:119b-36: gyi bar du lhur gnas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis yid
T02D3141:119b-37: bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing 'phyar ba'o
T02D3141:119b-38: pa'o // // nub tu rdo rje bzhad pa dkar
T02D3141:119b-39: bo g-yas pas so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo
T02D3141:119b-40: pa'o // // rje 'dzin pa / g-yon pas kyang
T02D3141:119b-41: de bzhin te so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i rdo
T02D3141:119b-43: nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs padma'i ze
T02D3141:119b-44: 'bru la snang ba mtha' yas rdo rje skyil krung
T02D3141:119b-45: can dmar po phyag g-yon pa dang cig shos gan
T02D3141:120a-1: pa phang pa'i steng du bzhag pa ting nge 'dzin
T02D3141:120a-2: gyi phyag rgya'i g-yas pa'i gung mos rdo rjes mtshan
T02D3141:120a-4: shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje chos dmar skya g-yon
T02D3141:120a-5: pa 'gying ba'i tshul dang bcas pas padma'i yu ba
T02D3141:120a-7: lho ru rdo rje rnon po nam mkha' lta bu
T02D3141:120a-8: sngon po g-yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha
T02D3141:120a-9: rol tu phyin pa'i lu sti 'dzin pa g-yas pas
T02D3141:120a-10: ral gri 'phyar ba'i tshul du 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:120a-11: byang du rdo rje rgyu gser btso ma'i mdog can
T02D3141:120a-12: g-yon par gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa g-yas
T02D3141:120a-13: ba'i gung mo mgal me lta bu bskor zhing chos
T02D3141:120a-15: nub tu rdo rje smra ba dmar po g-yon pa
T02D3141:120a-16: chos kyi dung dang g-yas pas rdo rje rtse gcig
T02D3141:120a-18: byang du khyung gi steng du sna tshogs padma'i lte
T02D3141:120a-19: bar don yod grub pa ljang gu rdo rje skyil
T02D3141:120a-21: phyag g-yas pa'i gung mos sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin
T02D3141:120a-22: pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul byed cing g-yon
T02D3141:120a-23: pa gan rkyal du pang par bzhag pa'o //
T02D3141:120a-24: shar gyi 'dab mar rdo rje las ljang gu g-yas
T02D3141:120a-25: pas snying gar bslang ba'i sbyor bas sna tshogs rdo
T02D3141:120a-26: rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:120a-27: g-yon pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa /
T02D3141:120a-28: yang na lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo spyi bor
T02D3141:120a-29: sbyar nas sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:120a-30: // lhor rdo rje bsrung ba ser po phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje'i go cha 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:120a-31: byang du rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po phyag gnyis
T02D3141:120a-32: kyis mthe chung gnyis kyi rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon
T02D3141:120a-33: gyi rtse mo gnyis rang gi khar bcug pas gdug
T02D3141:120a-34: pa rnams sdigs par byed pa'o //
T02D3141:120a-35: nub tu rdo rje khu tshur ser po khu tshur gyi mtshams su rdo rje ste /
T02D3141:120a-36: rdo rje khu tshur dag gis bzung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsdams pa'o //
T02D3141:120a-37: dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi me'i padma rdo rje
T02D3141:120a-38: sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje dkur brten pa'i phyag
T02D3141:120a-39: rgya'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:120a-40: bden bral du padma la phreng ba ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis ratna'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:120a-41: rlung du padma la glu ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis pi wang gi rgyud sbreng ba'o //
T02D3141:120a-42: dbang ldan du padma la gar ma ljang gu rdo
T02D3141:120b-0: rje rtse gsum pa gnyis bzung @120b nas phyag gnyis
T02D3141:120b-2: dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi phyi ru snam bu
T02D3141:120b-3: la shar du padma rnams la byams pa dang mthong
T02D3141:120b-4: ba don yod dang ngan song kun 'dren dang /
T02D3141:120b-5: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros rnams ni mi bskyod ba lta bu'o //
T02D3141:120b-6: lhor padma rnams la sbos kyi glang po dang /
T02D3141:120b-9: ye shes tog rnams ni rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o //
T02D3141:120b-10: nub tu padma rnams la 'od dpag med dang /
T02D3141:120b-11: zla ba'i 'od dang bzang skyong dang dra ba can gyi 'od rnams ni 'od dpag med lta bu'o //
T02D3141:120b-12: byang du padma rnams la rdo rje snying po dang /
T02D3141:120b-13: blo gros mi bzad pa dang /
T02D3141:120b-15: kun du bzang po rnams ni don yod grub pa lta bu'o //
T02D3141:120b-16: yang na shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la
T02D3141:120b-17: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' byams pa
T02D3141:120b-18: la sogs pa stong du bzhis mtshang ba bsgom par
T02D3141:120b-19: bya'o // de'i mtshan rnams mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bshad do //
T02D3141:120b-20: me'i mtshams su padma la rdo rje bdug sbos ma
T02D3141:120b-21: dkar mo dang bden bral gyi padma la rdo rje
T02D3141:120b-22: me tog ma ser po dang /
T02D3141:120b-23: rlung gi padma la rdo rje mar me ma dkar dmar dang /
T02D3141:120b-24: dbang ldan gyi padma la rdo rje dri chab ma ljang gu /
T02D3141:120b-25: bdug sbos ma la sogs pa 'di rnams gang bzhin du phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:120b-26: shar la sogs pa'i sgo'i padma rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje zhags pa dang /
T02D3141:120b-28: rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams rim pa bzhin du dkar
T02D3141:120b-29: po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu
T02D3141:120b-30: rnams ni gong bzhin du phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o//
T02D3141:120b-31: 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings las gzhan pa'i
T02D3141:120b-32: lha rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gos dang
T02D3141:120b-33: ratna sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa ratna'i cod pan can
T02D3141:120b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ma gtogs pa
T02D3141:120b-35: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs pa'o
T02D3141:120b-36: // rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub
T02D3141:120b-37: sems dpa' bcu drug ni rang gi rigs kyi bdag
T02D3141:120b-38: po de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du phyogs pa'o
T02D3141:120b-39: // // rnam par snar mdzad la sogs pa nas
T02D3141:120b-40: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi lha rnams ni ji
T02D3141:120b-41: ltar gsungs pa'i lte ba dang 'dab ma rnams la
T02D3141:120b-42: gnas shing nyi ma'i 'od zer can no //
T02D3141:121a-1: ba lnga las gzhan pa'i lha bzhi bcu zhe brgyad ni sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3141:121a-2: 'dir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings rnam par snang
T02D3141:121a-3: mdzad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings
T02D3141:121a-4: kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid la rang 'dra ba'i
T02D3141:121a-5: rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D3141:121a-6: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i bdag
T02D3141:121a-7: nyid kyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin
T02D3141:121a-8: gshegs pa bzhi'i rigs kyi bdag po ni rnam par
T02D3141:121a-9: snang mdzad do // sems ma rdo rje ma dang
T02D3141:121a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang sgeg
T02D3141:121a-11: mo dang bdug spos ma dang byams pa la sogs
T02D3141:121a-12: snang mdzad do // pa bzhi dang / rdo rje lcags kyu rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D3141:121a-13: rin chen rdo rje ma dang rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D3141:121a-14: phreng ba ma dang me tog ma dang spos kyi
T02D3141:121a-15: glang po la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje zhags
T02D3141:121a-16: pa rnams kyi rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D3141:121a-17: chos kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje chos la sogs pa bzhi dang glu ma dang /
T02D3141:121a-19: 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D3141:121a-20: rdo rje lcags sgrog rnams kyi snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D3141:121a-21: las kyi rdo rje ma dang /
T02D3141:121a-22: rdo rje las la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D3141:121a-23: gar ma dang dri chab ma dang /
T02D3141:121a-24: rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o //
T02D3141:121a-25: 'dir nang gi gzhal yas khang gi sgo rnams su 'ang /
T02D3141:121a-26: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa sgo skyong bzhi bsgom par bya'o zhes pa phyogs gzhan no //
T02D3141:121a-27: rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying ga'i sa bon a'a:
T02D3141:121a-28: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a ma h'a yo g'i
T02D3141:121a-29: shva ra h'um zhes pa ni snying po'o //
T02D3141:121a-30: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las thams cad pa'i sngags so //
T02D3141:121a-31: gang yang rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i rgyud
T02D3141:121a-32: gzhan gyis kyang lha'i rnam pa'i khyad par gsungs pa
T02D3141:121a-33: de ni 'dir mangs kyis dgos pas ma bshad do
T02D3141:121a-35: / // / bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can /
T02D3141:121a-36: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gur
T02D3141:121a-37: gyi nang la sogs pa gzhal yas khang bar du
T02D3141:121a-38: dang por bshad pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3141:121a-39: bzhin no // 'on kyang 'dir khro bo rnams ni
T02D3141:121a-40: 'og nas 'chad pa'i gzugs can no zhes pa ni
T02D3141:121a-41: bzhin no // phyogs gcig go // rdo rje gur
T02D3141:121a-42: gyi nang na ri rab kyi steng na sna tshogs
T02D3141:121a-43: padma'i lte bar gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte
T02D3141:121b-0: bar gzhal @121b yas khang zhas pa ni phyogs gnyis
T02D3141:121b-1: bzhin no // phyogs gcig go // pa'o // phyogs
T02D3141:121b-2: gnyis ka la yang mchod rten dkar po'i nang du
T02D3141:121b-4: de'i lte ba la seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs
T02D3141:121b-5: padma dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis
T02D3141:121b-6: bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D3141:121b-7: rang bzhin 'jam pa'i rdo rje sku mdog gser bco
T02D3141:121b-8: ma lta bu sdug cing yid du 'ong ba me
T02D3141:121b-9: tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i gtsug phud can gsum
T02D3141:121b-10: gyis rnam par brgyan pa rtsa ba dang g-yas dang
T02D3141:121b-11: g-yon gyi zhal ser po dang sngon po dang dkar
T02D3141:121b-12: po phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyi ral gri
T02D3141:121b-13: dang / mchog sbyin dang mda' dang /
T02D3141:121b-14: g-yon pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D3141:121b-15: phyin pa'i pu sti dang chu skyes sngon po dang
T02D3141:121b-16: gzhu 'dzin pa'o // bdag lta bu'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02D3141:121b-17: de'i shar phyogs kyi le tshe la glang po che'i
T02D3141:121b-18: steng du sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la mi
T02D3141:121b-19: bskyod pa sngon po 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa
T02D3141:121b-20: rtsa ba dang g-yas g-yon gyi zhal sngon po dang
T02D3141:121b-21: dkar po dang dmar po phyag brgyad pa g-yas pa'i
T02D3141:121b-22: gung mos snying gar rdo rje gyen du bsgreng ba
T02D3141:121b-23: / g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu dku la brten pa /
T02D3141:121b-24: g-yas gzhan rnams kyis ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mda' rnams so //
T02D3141:121b-25: g-yon pa rnams kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:121b-26: lho ru rta'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang
T02D3141:121b-27: nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan ser po sems
T02D3141:121b-28: dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3141:121b-29: ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g-yas g-yon gyi zhal lo //
T02D3141:121b-30: phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya byas la /
T02D3141:121b-31: g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:121b-32: g-yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:121b-33: nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D3141:121b-34: dang nyi ma la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis
T02D3141:121b-35: gnas pa'i snang pa mtha' yas dkar po dkar po
T02D3141:121b-36: dang sngon po dang dmar po rtsa ba dang g-yas
T02D3141:121b-38: phyag drug pa g-yon pa sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i padma'i yu ba snying gar bzung ste /
T02D3141:121b-40: g-yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:121b-41: g-yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:122a-1: gi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma
T02D3141:122a-2: la don yod grub pa sems dpa'i skyil krung gis
T02D3141:122a-3: bzhugs pa kha dog dmar po dmar po dang sngon
T02D3141:122a-4: po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g-yas g-yon gyi
T02D3141:122a-5: zhal lo // phyag drug pa dang po gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya bcing ba'o //
T02D3141:122a-6: g-yas pa gnyis kyis ral gri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:122a-7: g-yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:122a-8: dbang ldan du spyan ma ser mo ni sems dpa'i skyil krung can /
T02D3141:122a-9: phyag brgyad ma g-yas pa rnams kyis mchog sbyin dang
T02D3141:122a-10: mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:122a-11: // g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /
T02D3141:122a-12: rin po che'i snye ma dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:122a-13: mer m'a ma k'i sems dpa'i skyil krung can ma
T02D3141:122a-14: sngon mo ni khro ba dang bcas pas dgod pa
T02D3141:122a-15: phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa
T02D3141:122a-16: dang rdo rje dang mda' dang /
T02D3141:122a-17: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:122a-18: bden bral du gos dkar mo dmar po ni phyag
T02D3141:122a-19: drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang
T02D3141:122a-21: g-yon pa rnams kyis padma dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin cing 'gying ba'i chus kyis gnas pa'o //
T02D3141:122a-22: rlung du sgrol ma margad lta bu'i mdog can ma sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa /
T02D3141:122a-23: phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:122a-24: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang autpala dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:122a-25: rim pa gnyis pa la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs
T02D3141:122a-26: rnams su sems ma rdo rje ma dang rin chen
T02D3141:122a-27: rdo rje ma dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang
T02D3141:122a-28: / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams rim pa bzhin du sku mdog dang /
T02D3141:122a-29: phyag mtshan ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D3141:122a-30: 'on kyang nu ma 'dzin pa med pas sems ma
T02D3141:122a-31: rdo rje ma rin chen rdo rje ma las kyi
T02D3141:122a-32: rdo rje ma rnams sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:122a-33: chos kyi rdo rje ma ni zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:122a-34: dbang ldan du tsunda dkar mo zla ba'i mdog can
T02D3141:122a-35: phyag nyi shu rtsa drug ma rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis
T02D3141:122a-36: kyis snying gar rtsa ba'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D3141:122a-37: g-yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang ral gri
T02D3141:122a-38: dang ratna'i phreng ba dang bi dza p'u ra dang
T02D3141:122a-39: mda' dang dgra sta dang mdung thung dang thob dang
T02D3141:122b-0: @122b lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang ba dan gsum
T02D3141:122b-1: gyi tshul dang bgrang phreng ngo //
T02D3141:122b-2: g-yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D3141:122b-3: padma dang spyi blugs dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang
T02D3141:122b-4: shag ti dang 'khor lo dang ral gri dang sdigs
T02D3141:122b-5: mdzub dang bum pa bzang po dang bi di ba
T02D3141:122b-6: la dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti'o //
T02D3141:122b-7: kan dz'i ka'i stod g-yogs bcings pa bla gos phrag
T02D3141:122b-8: pa la gzar ba gar gyi nyams dgu'i rang bzhin
T02D3141:122b-9: rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po g-yas pa'i sngon po ljags
T02D3141:122b-10: 'gul zhing mche ba bag tsam gtsigs pa /
T02D3141:122b-11: g-yon pa ser po ma mchu mnan pa /
T02D3141:122b-12: thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i tshigs
T02D3141:122b-13: par zlum po'i rnam par bzhag ste mthe bong gnyis
T02D3141:122b-14: mdzub mo'i rtsa ba'i logs la gzhag par bya ste
T02D3141:122b-15: / snying gar bzhag pa 'di ni rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3141:122b-16: mer ni rin chen skar mda' ser mo phyag drug
T02D3141:122b-17: pa gnyis kyis snying gar rin po che kha sbyor
T02D3141:122b-18: 'dzin pa'o // g-yas pa gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang
T02D3141:122b-19: mda' 'dzin pa g-yon pa gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub dang
T02D3141:122b-20: 'dzin pa'o // gzhu 'dzin pa'o // bden bral du
T02D3141:122b-21: khro gnyer can dkar mo phyag drug ma g-yas pa
T02D3141:122b-22: rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mda' 'dzin
T02D3141:122b-24: pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang spyi blugs dang gzhu
T02D3141:122b-26: pa'o // rlung du rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ljang
T02D3141:122b-27: gu phyag drug ma g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje
T02D3141:122b-28: dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang mda' 'dzin pa
T02D3141:122b-29: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub pa dang zhags pa
T02D3141:122b-31: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis po
T02D3141:122b-32: 'di rnams ni rol pa'i kun du bskyod pa dang
T02D3141:122b-33: ldan pa zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing 'od dmar
T02D3141:122b-35: rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po bzhin du zhal gsum pa'o //
T02D3141:122b-36: rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor du shar gyi snam
T02D3141:122b-37: bu la byams pa gser gyi mdog lta bu phyag
T02D3141:122b-38: dang po gnyis chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D3141:122b-39: g-yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang g-yon pa
T02D3141:122b-40: me tog dang bcas pa'i klu shing gi yal ga
T02D3141:122b-41: 'dzin pa'o // 'jam dpal ni brjod zin pa'i gzugs can te /
T02D3141:122b-42: khyad par du shes rab ma dang bral ba'o //
T02D3141:123a-0: spos kyi glang po ljang gu g-yon pas bum par gnas pa'i glang po che'i @123a * //
T02D3141:123a-3: ye shes tog ser po g-yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:123a-5: lho ru bzang skyong sku mdog dmar po //
T02D3141:123a-6: g-yon pa ratna 'dzin pa g-yas pas mchog sbyin no //
T02D3141:123a-7: blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po phyag gnyis kyi sor
T02D3141:123a-8: mo thams cad brkyang pas chu rlabs kyi tshul byed
T02D3141:123a-9: pa'o // blo gros mi zad pa gser gyi mdog
T02D3141:123a-10: lta bu g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag ste
T02D3141:123a-11: pa'o // / g-yas pas mchog sbyin no //
T02D3141:123a-12: spobs pa brtsegs pa ljang gu g-yon pas khu tshur mkhal khung du bzhag pa'o //
T02D3141:123a-13: g-yas pas se gol gtogs pa'o //
T02D3141:123a-14: nub tu mthu chen thob dkar po g-yon pas bag tsam kha phye ba'i padma dkar po'o //
T02D3141:123a-16: ngan song kun 'dren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis sdig pa sprug pa'i tshul lo //
T02D3141:123a-17: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms
T02D3141:123a-18: pa'i blo gros gser gyi mdog lta bu phyag gnyis
T02D3141:123a-19: kha sbyar brdabs pa'i tshul lo //
T02D3141:123a-20: dra ba can gyi 'od dmar po g-yon pas autpala la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:123a-22: byang du zla 'od sku mdog zla ba'i 'od lta
T02D3141:123a-23: bu g-yon pas autpa lar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3141:123a-24: 'khor 'dzin pa g-yas pas mchog sbyin no //
T02D3141:123a-25: 'od dpag med dmar po phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:123a-26: nam mkha' mdzod sku mdog gser lta bus g-yon pas rdo rje khu tshur 'gying pas dkur brten pa /
T02D3141:123a-27: g-yas pas nam mkha' la bskor ba'o //
T02D3141:123a-28: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon po 'am dkar po g-yon pas sa la reg pa /
T02D3141:123a-29: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mthe bong dang sdigs mdzub sbyar te /
T02D3141:123a-30: dri ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o //
T02D3141:123a-31: byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di
T02D3141:123a-32: rnams ni zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can
T02D3141:123a-33: no // sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa spyan
T02D3141:123a-34: gsum pa rang phyogs kyi bdag po bzhin du zhal
T02D3141:123a-35: gsum pa phyag drug pa phyag gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag
T02D3141:123a-37: gnyis kyis gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:123b-0: byams pa dang 'jam dbyangs gnyis @123b la ni mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya med do //
T02D3141:123b-1: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha thams cad
T02D3141:123b-2: gos sna tshogs pa dang rin po che'i rgyan dang
T02D3141:123b-3: ral ba'i thor tshugs dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D3141:123b-4: zhal dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3141:123b-5: shar gyi sgor ma he'i steng du gshin rje mthar
T02D3141:123b-6: byed nag po phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis
T02D3141:123b-7: ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:123b-8: g-yon pas zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub gyen du bsgrengs pas sdigs par byed pa /
T02D3141:123b-9: g-yon pa'i gnyis pas 'khyud pa'i lha mo'i nu ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:123b-10: de yang zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa sku mdog
T02D3141:123b-11: dkar po g-yon pas padma dkar po 'dzin pa phyag
T02D3141:123b-12: g-yas pas yab la 'khyud par brtson pa'o //
T02D3141:123b-13: g-yon pa'i gsum pas dngul gyi gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:123b-14: ma rgad lta bu'i lha mo ljang gu phyag gnyis
T02D3141:123b-15: ma g-yas autpala sngon po 'dzin pa phyag g-yon pa
T02D3141:123b-16: yab kyi ske la 'khyud pas g-yas phyogs su brgyan
T02D3141:123b-17: pa / zhal drug pa gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02D3141:123b-18: zhal drug ni sngon po rtsa ba'i zhal dgyes pa'i gad mos bzhad pa /
T02D3141:123b-22: lnga pa rdo rje mche ba can /
T02D3141:123b-23: drug pa mgo'i steng du gnas pa ljags 'gul pa'o //
T02D3141:123b-24: yang na steng gi sngon po rtsa ba la sogs
T02D3141:123b-25: pa'i zhal rnams ni g-yas skor gyis sngon po dang
T02D3141:123b-26: dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang lhang
T02D3141:123b-27: gu rnams so // lho sgor gzhan gyis mi thub
T02D3141:123b-28: pa ser po ser po dang nag po dang dkar
T02D3141:123b-29: po rtsa ba dang g-yas g-yon gyi zhal lo//
T02D3141:123b-30: phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug tho dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:123b-31: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:123b-32: nub tu mgrin dmar po dmar po dang sngon po
T02D3141:123b-33: dang dkar po rtsa ba dang g-yas g-yon gyi zhal
T02D3141:123b-34: lo // phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo
T02D3141:123b-35: rje dang dbyug pa dang ka na ya dang mda'
T02D3141:123b-36: lo // rnams 'dzin pa'o // g-yon pa rnams kyis
T02D3141:123b-37: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma
T02D3141:123b-39: byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sngon po rkang pas bgegs mnan pa /
T02D3141:124a-0: phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis @124a * //
T02D3141:124a-1: ral gri dang dgra ste dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:124a-2: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:124a-3: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ratna'i ri bo'i steng du
T02D3141:124a-4: mi g-yo ba sngon po phyag drug pa g-yas pa
T02D3141:124a-5: rnams kyis ral gri dang zhags pa dang mda' 'dzin
T02D3141:124a-6: pa'o // g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas
T02D3141:124a-7: pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:124a-8: pa'o // // g-yon ngos su 'phyang ba'i gos sngon po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:124a-9: khrag gis brlan pa'i ljags 'gul ba'i zhal gdangs pa'o //
T02D3141:124a-10: mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po phyag drug pa
T02D3141:124a-11: dang po gnyis kyis rang gi phyag rgya byas pa
T02D3141:124a-12: g-yas pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang g-yon
T02D3141:124a-13: pa gnyis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:124a-14: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis phan tshun rgyab sbyar te
T02D3141:124a-15: mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te sdigs mdzub gnyis phyir brkyang
T02D3141:124a-16: nas zhags pa'i tshul byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal
T02D3141:124a-17: po'i phyag rgya'o // bden bral du dbyug pa sngon
T02D3141:124a-18: po sku mdog sngon po phyag drug pa g-yas pa
T02D3141:124a-19: rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mda'/
T02D3141:124a-20: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:124a-21: rlung du stobs po che sngon po phyag brgyad pa
T02D3141:124a-22: g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang
T02D3141:124a-24: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags
T02D3141:124a-25: pa dang nu ma dang tho ba dang gzhu 'dzin
T02D3141:124a-26: pa'o // dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi steng du
T02D3141:124a-27: gnod mdzes rgyal po sngon po phyag gnyis kyis rdo
T02D3141:124a-28: rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa g-yas pa
T02D3141:124a-29: gnyis kyis ral gri dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:124a-30: g-yon pa gnyis kyis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:124a-31: 'dir 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi
T02D3141:124a-32: mdzub mo gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba ni gnod mdzes
T02D3141:124a-33: kyi phyag rgya'o // 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og
T02D3141:124a-34: sngon po phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo
T02D3141:124a-35: rje dang lcags kyu dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:124a-36: g-yon pa rnams kyis nu ma dang zhags pa dang bcas pa'i rtse gcig pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:124a-37: bgegs mthar byed la sogs pa bdun po ni sngon
T02D3141:124a-38: po dang ser po dang dmar po rtsa ba dang
T02D3141:124b-0: g-yas g-yon gyi zhal gsum @124b mo ;
T02D3141:124b-1: ; khro bo bcu yang khros pa'i lta stang can
T02D3141:124b-2: spyan dmar po smin ma g-yo ba bag tsam rtsa
T02D3141:124b-5: g-yon pa'i zhal ma mchu mnan pa mche ba gtsigs
T02D3141:124b-6: pa stag gi pags pas smad dang stod la gon
T02D3141:124b-7: pa thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan pa ;
T02D3141:124b-8: dbu skra 'bar ba gyen la bcings shing 'khyil ba
T02D3141:124b-9: spa ra dmar ser rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pa
T02D3141:124b-10: can / klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3141:124b-11: phud kyi sgra sgrogs pa dang bcas pa'i gdengs ka can rnams kyis 'jigs pa sna tshogs padma dang /
T02D3141:124b-12: ni ma'i gdan la g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o //
T02D3141:124b-13: gshin rje mthar byed ni g-yas brkyang ba'am rdo rje skyil krung gis kyang bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3141:124b-14: dkyil 'khor 'di la gnod mdzes rgyal po'i gzugs kho
T02D3141:124b-15: nas rnam par gnas pa'i phyir gtsug tor 'khor los
T02D3141:124b-16: sgyur ba ni dkyil 'khor nyid du tha dad du
T02D3141:124b-17: ma bshad de ; dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las rnal 'byor rgyas par bstan pa la'o //
T02D3141:124b-18: 'bring bor bstan pa la ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D3141:124b-19: spyi bo'i steng na ratna'i ri la gnas pa'i padma
T02D3141:124b-20: dang nyi ma la rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas
T02D3141:124b-21: pa'i gtsug tor 'khor los skyur ba ser po ser
T02D3141:124b-22: po dang sngon po dang dkar po rtsa ba dang
T02D3141:124b-23: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal lo //
T02D3141:124b-24: phyag brgyad pa'i phyag gnyis kyis mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya byas pa /
T02D3141:124b-25: g-yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang bgrang phreng dang mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:124b-26: g-yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:124b-27: sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che'i rgyan can /
T02D3141:124b-28: ral pa'i thor cog gi cod pan can gzhogs gnyis
T02D3141:124b-29: su spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi po
T02D3141:124b-30: rnams kyis brgyan pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D3141:124b-31: de'i rjes su 'brangs nas rnal 'byor rgyas pa la /
T02D3141:124b-32: yang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni dkyil 'khor
T02D3141:124b-33: ba tha dad du dang de'i steng du gnod mdzes
T02D3141:124b-34: rgyal po shes par bya'o zhes pa ni kha cig
T02D3141:124b-35: go // lha gzhan bzhi bcu zhe gsum po rnams kyang zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa'o //
T02D3141:124b-36: 'dir nu ma 'dzin par bstan pa de yang mi
T02D3141:125a-0: bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi bdag lta @125a *
T02D3141:125a-1: // bu'i shes rab ma la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D3141:125a-2: khro bo rnams kyis ni bdag lta bu'i shes rab
T02D3141:125a-3: ma g-yon ngo su gnas pa'i nu ma 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:125a-5: gshin rje mthar byed las gzhan rnams la shes rab
T02D3141:125a-6: ma med kyang de'i nu mar 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis
T02D3141:125a-7: bdag gi nu mar 'dzin pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan
T02D3141:125a-8: no // 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin
T02D3141:125a-9: 'jam pa'i rdo rje chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag
T02D3141:125a-10: pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid lta bu'i rdo rje
T02D3141:125a-12: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rang
T02D3141:125a-13: bzhin mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D3141:125a-14: pa bzhi dang / spyan ma dang tsunda rnams la 'jam pa'i rdo rjes rgyas btab pa /
T02D3141:125a-15: m'a ma k'i dang sems ma rdo rje ma dang byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D3141:125a-16: khro bo bcu la mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa /
T02D3141:125a-17: rin chen rdo rje ma dang rin chen skar mda' ma dang ;
T02D3141:125a-18: bzang skyong ma la sogs pa bzhi la rin 'byung gis rgyas btab pa /
T02D3141:125a-19: gos dkar mo dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang
T02D3141:125a-20: khro gnyer ma dang mthu chen po thob la sogs
T02D3141:125a-21: pa bzhi la snang ba mtha' yas kyis rgyas btab
T02D3141:125a-22: pa / sgrol ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /
T02D3141:125a-23: zla 'od la sogs pa bzhi la don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D3141:125a-24: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs kar sa bon ni mu:'o //
T02D3141:125a-25: aom a'a: zhes pa snying po'i sngags so //
T02D3141:125a-26: aom a'a mri ta kunda li bighn'a nta ka h'um zhes pa las thams cad pa'i sngags so /
T02D3141:125a-28: // / chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la /
T02D3141:125a-29: rdo rje gur la sogs pa bsgom par rnam par
T02D3141:125a-30: bzhag pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin
T02D3141:125a-31: no // khyad par du gshin rje gshed la sogs
T02D3141:125a-32: pa'i khro bo rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzugs
T02D3141:125a-33: no // can no // mchod rten ni 'dir med do //
T02D3141:125a-34: gzhal yas khang gi lte ba la sna tshogs padma'i
T02D3141:125a-35: ze 'bru la gnas pa'i seng ge'i lteng du sna
T02D3141:125a-36: tshogs padma dang zla ba la 'jam pa'i dbyangs rdo
T02D3141:125a-37: rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa nyi ma 'char ba'i
T02D3141:125a-38: dkyil 'khor 'od dang ldan pa sku mdog gser lta
T02D3141:125a-39: bu / aindra n'i la lta bu'i gtsug phud dang ldan pa /
T02D3141:125b-0: rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma @125b dang
T02D3141:125b-1: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyi steng
T02D3141:125b-2: du sangs rgyas lnga dang rin po che'i cod pan
T02D3141:125b-3: can / ratna sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang na bza' sna tshogs bsnams pa /
T02D3141:125b-4: sgeg pa'i nyams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa /
T02D3141:125b-5: ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar
T02D3141:125b-6: po ni rtsa ba dang g-yas dang nub dang g-yon
T02D3141:125b-7: gyi zhal lo // phyag brgyad pa'i phyag gnyis kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o //
T02D3141:125b-8: g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D3141:125b-9: g-yon pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D3141:125b-10: phyin pa'i bu sti dang gzhu dang rdo rje dril
T02D3141:125b-11: bu bsnams pa'o // 'dab ma brgyad pa la seng
T02D3141:125b-12: ge'i steng du gnas pa'i padma dang zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3141:125b-13: 'khor rnams la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su
T02D3141:125b-14: gtsug tor chen po dang gdugs dkar po dang gzi
T02D3141:125b-16: rnam pa rgyal pa'i gtsug tor rnams dang /
T02D3141:125b-17: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su 'od zer rnam
T02D3141:125b-18: par 'phro ba dang 'phags pa dang cher 'phags pa
T02D3141:125b-20: gtsug tor brgyad po 'di rnams ni rdo rje skyil
T02D3141:125b-21: krung dang rin po che'i cod pan can sku mdog
T02D3141:125b-23: phyag g-yas pas 'khor lo gyen du bzung ba /
T02D3141:125b-24: g-yon pas rang gi gdan la mnan pa rnams so //
T02D3141:125b-25: de nas shar gyi re mig gi dbus su glang
T02D3141:125b-26: po che'i rgyal po la mi bskyod pa sngon po
T02D3141:125b-27: / zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal sngon po bag
T02D3141:125b-28: tsam khro ba dang bcas pa'i rol pa dang ldan
T02D3141:125b-29: pa g-yas pa dkar po kha gdangs pa drag po'o
T02D3141:125b-30: / // nub kyi ser po dpa' bo g-yon pa
T02D3141:125b-31: dmar po mche bas ma mchu mnan pa phyag brgyad
T02D3141:125b-32: pa g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje
T02D3141:125b-33: dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:125b-34: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:125b-36: rdo rje rgyal po dang rdo rje chags pa dang rdo rje legs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o//
T02D3141:125b-37: lho'i re mig gi dbus su rta mchog gi steng
T02D3141:125b-38: du rin chen 'byung ldan ser po ser po dang
T02D3141:125b-39: / nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal
T02D3141:125b-40: bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo
T02D3141:125b-41: rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu'o /
T02D3141:126a-0: g-yon pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang rdo rje @126a * //
T02D3141:126a-1: dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:126a-2: rdo rje rin chen dang rdo rje nyi ma dang
T02D3141:126a-3: rdo rje tog dang rdo rje bzhad pa rnams kyis
T02D3141:126a-5: nub kyi re mig gi dbus su rma bya'i steng
T02D3141:126a-6: du snang ba mtha' yas dmar po dmar po dang
T02D3141:126a-7: nag po dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal bzhi'o
T02D3141:126a-8: ; / phyag brgyad kyi g-yas pa rnams kyis rdo
T02D3141:126a-9: rje dang mda' dang ral gri dang lcags kyu 'dzin
T02D3141:126a-10: ; pa'o // g-yon pa rnams kyis padma dang gzhu dang zhags pa dang /
T02D3141:126a-12: rdo rje chos dang rdo rje rnon po dang /
T02D3141:126a-13: rdo rje rgyu dang rdo rje gsung ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D3141:126a-14: byang gi re mig gi dbus su khyung gi steng
T02D3141:126a-15: du don yod grub pa ljang gu zhal bzhi pa
T02D3141:126a-16: rtsa ba'i zhal ljang gu mche ba gtsigs pa g-yas
T02D3141:126a-17: ser po zhi ba nub dmar po sgeg pa dang
T02D3141:126a-18: bcas pa / g-yon dkar po zhi ba phyag brgyad pa /
T02D3141:126a-19: g-yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:126a-20: g-yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:126a-21: rdo rje las dang rdo rje bsrung ba dang rdo
T02D3141:126a-22: rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyis
T02D3141:126a-24: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3141:126a-25: rnams rang rang gi chibs kyi steng du sna tshogs
T02D3141:126a-26: padma dang nyi ma'i gdan la rdo rje skyil krung
T02D3141:126a-27: gis bzhugs pa / ratna sna tshogs dang gos kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3141:126a-28: rin po che'i cod pan no //
T02D3141:126a-29: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bcu drug po
T02D3141:126a-30: 'di rnams ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su
T02D3141:126a-31: gnas pa'i sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan la
T02D3141:126a-32: gnas pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad
T02D3141:126a-33: pa'i rang bzhin can rnams so //
T02D3141:126a-34: 'di dag kyang phyogs su gnas pa'o zhes pa'i phyogs kyang yod do //
T02D3141:126a-35: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams la gnas pa'i sna
T02D3141:126a-36: tshogs padma dang zla ba rnams la sems dpa'i skyil
T02D3141:126a-37: krung can / sangs rgyas spyan ma dang ma ma
T02D3141:126a-38: k'i dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma rnams rim
T02D3141:126a-39: pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang
T02D3141:126a-40: mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don
T02D3141:126a-42: shar gyi sgo ru rdo rje lcags kyu dmar ser rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:126b-0: lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ser po @126b rdo
T02D3141:126b-1: rje zhags pa 'dzin pa g-yon brkyang gis gnas pa'o
T02D3141:126b-2: // nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po rdo
T02D3141:126b-3: rje lcags sgrog phyag gnyis kyis 'dzin pas ga'i stang
T02D3141:126b-5: byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu phyag gnyis
T02D3141:126b-6: rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa
T02D3141:126b-7: / zlum pa'i stang stabs kyis gnas pa'o //
T02D3141:126b-8: bzhi po 'di dag sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma
T02D3141:126b-9: la gnas pa zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa spyan
T02D3141:126b-10: gsum pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa
T02D3141:126b-11: / smar dmar ser dang ldan pa klu chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D3141:126b-12: nang gi dkyil 'khor 'di las dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la /
T02D3141:126b-13: shar gyi phyogs kyi dbang ldan nas brtsams nas g-yas
T02D3141:126b-14: skor du rim pa bzhin du sa bcu gnyis kyi
T02D3141:126b-15: lha mo rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
T02D3141:126b-16: g-yas pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:126b-17: g-yon pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:126b-18: de la mos pa spyod pa'i sa ma ni padma bzhin du dmar ba padma dmar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:126b-19: rab tu dga' ba dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:126b-20: dri ma med ma dkar mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:126b-21: 'od byed ma dmar mo sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:126b-22: 'od 'phro ma ma rgad lta bu'i mdog autpa la sngon po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:126b-23: sbyang kha ma ser mo pang bar gnas pa'i phyag
T02D3141:126b-24: gan rkyal gyis ma ra ga ta'i nor bu bsnams
T02D3141:126b-25: pa'o // mngon du gyur pa'i sa ma gser gyi
T02D3141:126b-26: mdog can padma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D3141:126b-27: tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:126b-28: ring du song ba ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs
T02D3141:126b-29: sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D3141:126b-30: 'dzin pa'o // mi g-yo ba ma ston ka'i zla
T02D3141:126b-31: ba'i mdog lta bu zla ba gnas pa'i rdo rje
T02D3141:126b-32: rtse lnga ba dmar pos mtshan pa'i padma'i yu ba
T02D3141:126b-34: lags pa'i blo gros ma dkar mo ral gris mtshan pa'i autpa la 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:126b-35: chos kyi sprin ma ser mo chos kyi sprin gyis
T02D3141:126b-36: yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D3141:126b-38: kun tu 'od ma nyi ma phyed kyi nyi ma'i
T02D3141:126b-39: mdog can padma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D3141:126b-40: byang chub mtshon par byed pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i
T02D3141:127a-1: lho ru pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis ni
T02D3141:127a-2: phyag gnyis pa g-yas pa thams cad kyis yid bzhin
T02D3141:127a-4: g-yon pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni phyag gnyis kyis lhag pa'o //
T02D3141:127a-6: de la rin po che'i padma'i pha rol tu phyin
T02D3141:127a-7: ma dmar mo padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3141:127a-8: 'khor 'dzin pa'o // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T02D3141:127a-9: ma dkar dmar gyi mdog can 'bras so ba'i snye
T02D3141:127a-11: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo
T02D3141:127a-12: mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang bcas pa'i me
T02D3141:127a-14: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127a-15: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ma ra
T02D3141:127a-16: ga ta lta bu'i mdog can autpala sngon po 'dzin
T02D3141:127a-17: pa'o // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs padma dkar po 'dzin pa'o//
T02D3141:127a-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gser mdog
T02D3141:127a-19: lta bu yid du 'ong ma padma la gnas pa'i
T02D3141:127a-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pu sti
T02D3141:127a-21: 'dzin ma / phyag gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa'o //
T02D3141:127a-22: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma me tog pri
T02D3141:127a-23: yang ku lta pu ljang gu padma ser po la
T02D3141:127a-24: gnas pa'i ral gri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127a-25: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma autpala sngon
T02D3141:127a-26: po'i mdog can autpala sngon po la gnas pa'i ral
T02D3141:127a-27: gri 'dzin pa'o // stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D3141:127a-28: ma dmar mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D3141:127a-30: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo
T02D3141:127a-31: ratna sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub
T02D3141:127a-32: kyi shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127a-33: rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni
T02D3141:127a-34: sku mdog sna tshogs pa autpala sngon po la gnas
T02D3141:127a-35: pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127a-36: nub tu dbang bcu ma ni phyag gnyis g-yas pa rnams kyis padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127a-37: g-yon pa rnams kyis snyems pas rang rang gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127a-38: de la tshe la dbang ba ma ni dkar dmar
T02D3141:127a-39: gyi mdog can nor bu padma r'a ga la gnas
T02D3141:127a-40: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can gyis sangs
T02D3141:127a-41: rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sku 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127a-42: sems la dbang ba ma ni dkar mo rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-0: yo byad @127b la dbang ba ma ni ser mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-1: las la dbang ba ma ni ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-2: skye ba la dbang ba ma ni sku mdog sna
T02D3141:127b-3: tshogs ma me tog dz'a ti kha dog sna tshogs
T02D3141:127b-5: rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba ma ni nam mkha' ltar
T02D3141:127b-6: sngo ba sangs padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang
T02D3141:127b-8: mos pa la dbang ba ma ni padma'i rtsa ba
T02D3141:127b-9: ltar dkar ba'i pri yang ku'i ma tog gi snyem
T02D3141:127b-10: 'dzin pa'o // smon lam la dbang ba ma ni ser mo autpala sngon po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-11: ye shes la dbang ba ma sngon mo autpa la sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-12: chos la dbang ba ma sku mdog dkar mo padma la gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-13: de bzhin nyid ma dkar mo phyag g-yas pas padma dkar po 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:127b-14: g-yon pas rdo rje rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-15: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma gser gzhu lta bu'i
T02D3141:127b-16: mdog can phyag g-yas kyis padma ser po la gnas
T02D3141:127b-17: pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-18: g-yon pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-19: byang du gzugs ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis ma
T02D3141:127b-20: g-yas pa rnams kyis sna tshogs rdo rje dang g-yon
T02D3141:127b-21: pa rnams snyems pa dang bcas pas rang rang gi
T02D3141:127b-23: de la dbyig gi blo gros ma ser mo 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-24: rin chen skar mda' ma dmar mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-25: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dkar mo nor bu zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-26: 'od zer can dkar dmar skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-27: ri khrod lo ma can ljang gu rma bya'i mjug sgro 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-28: dgu sel ma dkar mo dug gi me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:127b-29: sgo mtha' yas ma me tog pri yang ku ltar
T02D3141:127b-30: ljang bu chu skyes dmar po la gnas pa'i mi
T02D3141:127b-31: zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o //

T02D3141:131a-12: phyag bzhi pa spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba dang rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:131a-13: gdong drug dmar po rma bya la zhon pa gdong
T02D3141:131a-14: drug pa phyag drug pa g-yas pa gnyis sha ka
T02D3141:131a-15: ti dang rdo rje 'dzin pa g-yon pa gnyis kyis
T02D3141:131a-16: khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:131a-17: lhag ma gnyis kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D3141:131a-18: 'di rnams kyang gong bzhin du rang gi btsun mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D3141:131a-19: tshangs ma ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3141:131a-20: drag mo ni drag po dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3141:131a-21: khyab 'jug ma ni khyab 'jug dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3141:131a-22: gzhon du ma ni gdong drug dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02D3141:131a-23: dbang mo ni dbang po dang mtshungs pa'o//
T02D3141:131a-24: phag mo nag mo ni 'ug pa la zhon pa
T02D3141:131a-25: phyag bzhi pa phyag g-yas g-yon gnyis kyis ro hi
T02D3141:131a-26: ta'i nya dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:131a-27: gzhan gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D3141:131a-28: tsa mund'i dmar mo ri dags la zhon pa phyag
T02D3141:131a-29: bzhi ma g-yas g-yon gyis gri gug dang thod pa
T02D3141:131a-30: 'dzin pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D3141:131a-31: bhringgi ri ti nag mo shin tu skem pa phyag
T02D3141:131a-32: bzhi pa gnyis kyis phreng ba dang spyi blugs 'dzin
T02D3141:131a-33: pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D3141:131a-34: tshogs bdag dkar po byi ba la zhon pa glang
T02D3141:131a-35: po che'i gdong can sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa
T02D3141:131a-36: can phyag bzhi'i g-yas gnyis kyis rtse gsum pa dang
T02D3141:131a-37: la du g-yon gnyis kyis dgra sta dang la phug
T02D3141:131a-38: 'dzin pa'o // nag po chen po nag po rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:131a-39: dga' byed dbang phyug nag po rdza rnga la zhon pa rdza rnga brdung ba la brtson pa'o //
T02D3141:131a-40: nyi ma dmar po rta bdun gyis 'dren pa'i shing
T02D3141:131a-41: rta la zhon pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag
T02D3141:131b-0: gnyis @131b padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3141:131b-1: 'dzin pa'o // zla ba dkar po ngang pa la
T02D3141:131b-2: zhon pa phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pas ku mu
T02D3141:131b-3: da la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:131b-4: 'dzin pa'o // // mig dmar dmar por la zhon
T02D3141:131b-5: pa g-yas na gri gug g-yon pas mi mgo za
T02D3141:131b-7: / lhag pa ser po padma'i steng du mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:131b-8: phur bu dkar po thod pa'am sbal ba la zhon pa phreng ba dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:131b-9: pa ba sangs dkar po padma la gnas pa phreng ba dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:131b-10: spen pa nag po rus sbal la gnas pa dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o ;
T02D3141:131b-11: / sgra gcan dmar nag phyag gnyis kyis nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:131b-12: mjug rings nag po ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:131b-13: stobs bzangs dkar po glang po la gnas pa ral gri dang gshol 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:131b-14: rgyal bar byed pa ljang gu bya ko ki la'i
T02D3141:131b-15: shing rta la zhon pa ljang gu phyag bzhi pa
T02D3141:131b-16: g-yas pa gnyis na me tog gi phreng ba dang
T02D3141:131b-17: mda' g-yon gnyis kyis btung ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin
T02D3141:131b-18: pa'o // sbrang rtsir byed pa dkar po ne tso'i
T02D3141:131b-19: shing rta la gnas pa phyag bzhi pa g-yas chu
T02D3141:131b-20: srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang mda' g-yon pa gnyis na
T02D3141:131b-22: dpyid kyi lha dkar po spre'u la gnas pa phyag
T02D3141:131b-23: bzhi pa g-yas pa gnyis kyis mda' dang ral gri
T02D3141:131b-24: g-yon pa gnyis btung ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:131b-25: // klu mtha' yas dang nor rgyas dang 'jog po
T02D3141:131b-26: dang stobs kyi rgyu dang padma dang padma chen po
T02D3141:131b-27: dang bung skyong dang rigs ldan rnams sbrul mgo bdun
T02D3141:131b-28: dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D3141:131b-29: yang na rang rang gi yab kyi g-yas pa'i phyag
T02D3141:131b-30: mtshan gyi gtso bo dang ldan pas thal mo sbyar
T02D3141:131b-31: ba'o // thags bzangs ris dang stobs ldan dang tshim byed dang /
T02D3141:131b-32: rnam par snang byed la sogs pa lha ma yin
T02D3141:131b-33: gyi dbang po chen po rnams mdog nag po g-yul
T02D3141:131b-34: 'gyed pa'i go cha sna tshogs bgos pa ral gri
T02D3141:131b-35: dang phe ta ka la sogs pa'i mtshon cha sna
T02D3141:131b-37: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gshog pa brkyang ba
T02D3141:131b-38: pus mo'i bar du dkar po de'i steng du lte
T02D3141:132a-0: ba'i bar du ser po de'i steng du @132a *
T02D3141:132a-1: // mgrin pa'i bar du dmar po //
T02D3141:132a-2: de'i steng du mgo'i bar du nag po phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D3141:132a-3: mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dmar ser phyag gnyis kyis pi wang gi sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02D3141:132a-4: dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa ser po phyag gnyis kyis pi wang gi sgra sgrogs pa'o ;
T02D3141:132a-5: / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po don kun grub
T02D3141:132a-6: pa dkar po me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:132a-7: // gang ba bzang po sngon po /
T02D3141:132a-8: nor bu bzang po ser po /
T02D3141:132a-10: rnam thos kyi bu ser po /
T02D3141:132a-11: pi tsi kunda li dmar po /
T02D3141:132a-12: ki li ma l'i ljang gu /
T02D3141:132a-14: spyod pa'i dbang po ser po ste /
T02D3141:132a-15: gang ba bzang po la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi
T02D3141:132a-16: bdag po 'di dag ni phyag gnyis kyi g-yas kyis
T02D3141:132a-17: shing thog pi dza p'u ra dang g-yon ne'u le
T02D3141:132a-18: 'dzin pa'o // 'phrog ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis
T02D3141:132a-19: zan gyi chang bu gnyis 'dzin pa bu dang bcas
T02D3141:132a-20: 'dzin pa'o // pa'o // tha skar dkar po dang /
T02D3141:132a-26: na ba so sor po dang /
T02D3141:132a-30: gre me tog bri yang ku lta bu ljang ser dang /
T02D3141:132a-48: tha skar la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di rnams ni
T02D3141:132a-49: stod g-yogs g-yo ba dang bcas pa rnams thal mo
T02D3141:132a-50: sbyar ba'o // gzhan yang lha rnams ni shing rta la gnas par shes par bya'o //
T02D3141:132a-51: dbang po la sogs pa'i lha rnams padma la gnas
T02D3141:132a-52: pa re re la'ang 'khor dpag tu med pas bskor
T02D3141:132a-53: pa'o // sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du rin po che dang gos sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D3141:132a-54: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das la phyag
T02D3141:132a-55: 'tshal zhing bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra
T02D3141:132b-0: phyogs thams cad du sgrogs @132b ba'o ;
T02D3141:132b-1: / shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje
T02D3141:132b-2: lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i sgo skyong rnams ni
T02D3141:132b-4: 'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i
T02D3141:132b-5: bdag nyid 'jam pa'i dbyangs shin tu rnam par dag
T02D3141:132b-6: pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin
T02D3141:132b-7: la bdag nyid lta bu'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas
T02D3141:132b-8: btab pa'o // me long lta bu la sogs pa'i
T02D3141:132b-9: ye shes kyi ngo bo mi bskyod pa la sogs
T02D3141:132b-10: pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang gtsug tor brgyad
T02D3141:132b-11: btab pa'o // dang / spyan ma la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D3141:132b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' la sog pa bzhi dang m'a ma k'i dang /
T02D3141:132b-13: rdo rje lcags kyu dang sa bcu gnyis dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa ma dang /
T02D3141:132b-14: sgeg mo dang kun du bzang po la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D3141:132b-15: khro bo bcu dang me tog ma dang /
T02D3141:132b-16: rdo rje gzugs ma dang shar phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la mi bskyod pas so //
T02D3141:132b-17: rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje zhags pa dang /
T02D3141:132b-18: pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis dang don so
T02D3141:132b-19: so yang dag par rig pa ma dang phreng ba
T02D3141:132b-20: ma dang nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa bzhi dang
T02D3141:132b-21: / bdug spos ma dang rdo rje sgra ma dang
T02D3141:132b-22: lho'i phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la rin chen
T02D3141:132b-24: / rdo rje chos la sogs pa bzhi dang gos dkar mo dang /
T02D3141:132b-25: rdo rje lcags sgrog dang tshe la dbang ba ma la sogs pa bcu gnyis dang /
T02D3141:132b-26: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa
T02D3141:132b-27: ma dang glu ma dang spyan ras gzigs la sogs
T02D3141:132b-28: pa bzhi dang / mar me ma dang rdo rje ro ma dang /
T02D3141:132b-29: nub phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la 'od dpag med kyis so //
T02D3141:132b-30: rdo rje las la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D3141:132b-32: gzungs bcu gnyis dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ma dang /
T02D3141:132b-33: gar ma dang 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi
T02D3141:132b-34: dang dri cha ba ma dang rdo rje reg bya
T02D3141:132b-35: ma dang ; byang phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la do yod grub pas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D3141:132b-36: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni mu'o //
T02D3141:132b-37: aa a'a sarba ta tha ga ta hri da ya
T02D3141:132b-38: ha ra ha ra aom h'um hr'i: bha ga w'a
T02D3141:132b-39: na dzny'a na m'u rti w'a g'i shva ra mah'a
T02D3141:132b-40: w'a tsa sarba dharm'a ga ga na aa ma la
T02D3141:133a-1: dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a: zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sngags so //
T02D3141:133a-2: aom aa mri ta kunda li baghn'a nta ka h'um
T02D3141:133a-3: zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste las
T02D3141:133a-6: // / ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D3141:133a-7: rdo rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang
T02D3141:133a-8: chu dang sa dang ri rab kyi steng du gzhal
T02D3141:133a-9: yas khang gi dbus su nang gi dkyil 'khor la
T02D3141:133a-10: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ser po /
T02D3141:133a-11: rdo rje phreng ba sngon pos bskor ba ste /
T02D3141:133a-12: 'ga' zhig tu 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa sngon por gsungs so //
T02D3141:133a-13: gzhan ni 'di'i 'khor lo'i lte ba sngon po shar
T02D3141:133a-14: gyi rtsibs dkar po lho nag po nub dmar po
T02D3141:133a-15: byang ljang gu'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D3141:133a-16: 'khor lo'i lte ba la sna tshogs padma la gnas
T02D3141:133a-17: pa'i seng ge'i steng du bcom ldan 'das sh'akya seng
T02D3141:133a-18: ge rnam par snang mdzad chen po shin tu gser
T02D3141:133a-19: gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad
T02D3141:133a-20: pa'o // shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje gtsug tor dkar pos gnon gyi phyag rgya can no //
T02D3141:133a-21: lho'i rtsibs la rin chen gtsug tor sngon po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o //
T02D3141:133a-22: nub kyi rtsibs la padma gtsug tor dmar po bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya can no //
T02D3141:133a-23: byang gi rtsibs la sna tshogs gtsug tor ljang gu mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3141:133a-24: me'i rtsibs la gtsug tor gzi brjid sku mdog dkar
T02D3141:133a-25: dmar phyag gnyis kyis nyi ma 'dzin pa phyag g-yon
T02D3141:133a-27: bden bral gyi rtsibs la gtsug tor rgyal mtshan sku
T02D3141:133a-28: mdog dmar nag 'dres pas phyag gnyis kyis yid bzhin
T02D3141:133a-29: gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:133a-30: rlung gi rtsibs la gtsug tor rnon po nam mkha'
T02D3141:133a-31: ltar sngo bsangs phyag g-yas pas ral gri 'dzin pa
T02D3141:133a-33: dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la gtsug tor gdugs dkar sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis kyis gdugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:133a-34: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol mi la sogs pa'i
T02D3141:133a-35: mtshams su sgeg mo dang phreng ba ma dang glu
T02D3141:133a-36: ma dang gar ma rnams sku mdog dkar mo dang
T02D3141:133a-37: ser mo dang dmar mo dang sna tshogs can ma
T02D3141:133a-38: phyag gnyis pa'o // snam bu la sgo'i g-yon logs
T02D3141:133a-39: su byang chub sems dpa' gnyis dang g-yas logs su
T02D3141:133b-0: phyag gnyis pa'o // gnyis so // de la shar @133b gyi snam bu la byams pa ser po /
T02D3141:133b-1: g-yas pa'i phyag gis klu shing gi me tog dang /
T02D3141:133b-3: mthong ba don yod ser po phyag g-yas pas spyan dang bcas pa'i padma 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:133b-4: g-yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02D3141:133b-5: ngan song kun 'dren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:133b-6: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo
T02D3141:133b-7: gros dkar ser 'dres pa'i mdog can phyag g-yas dbyug
T02D3141:133b-8: pa 'dzin pa g-yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o
T02D3141:133b-9: // lho phyogs kyi snam bu la spos kyi glang
T02D3141:133b-10: po dkar ljang g-yas kyis dri'i dung phor 'dzin pa
T02D3141:133b-11: // / g-yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02D3141:133b-12: dpa' bar 'gro ba dkar po g-yas pas ral gri g-yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02D3141:133b-13: nam mkha' mdzod dkar ser g-yas pas padma la gnas
T02D3141:133b-14: pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa g-yon pas khu tshur
T02D3141:133b-15: dkur brten pa'o // ye shes tog sngon po phyag
T02D3141:133b-16: g-yas kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin
T02D3141:133b-17: pa g-yon pas khu tshur dkur brtan pa'o //
T02D3141:133b-18: nub kyi snam bu la bdud rtsi'i 'od dkar po
T02D3141:133b-19: g-yas pas cod pan gyi steng du bdud rtsis gang
T02D3141:133b-20: ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa g-yon pas khu tshur dkur
T02D3141:133b-21: brten pa'o // zla ba'i 'od dkar po g-yas pas
T02D3141:133b-22: padma la gnas pa'i zla ba 'dzin pa g-yon pas
T02D3141:133b-24: bzang skyong dkar po g-yas pas rin po che 'bar
T02D3141:133b-25: ba dang bcas pa 'dzin pa g-yon pas khu tshur
T02D3141:133b-26: dkur brten pa'o // dra ba can gyi 'od dmar po g-yas pas rdo rje'i gur 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:133b-27: g-yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02D3141:133b-28: byang gi snam bu la rdo rje snying po sngo
T02D3141:133b-29: skya g-yas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i autpala sngon po
T02D3141:133b-30: 'dzin pa g-yon pas khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
T02D3141:133b-31: blo gros mi zad pa dkar po phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:133b-32: spobs pa brtsegs pa dmar po g-yas pas chu skyes
T02D3141:133b-33: la gnas pa'i ratna brtsegs pa bsnams pa g-yon pas
T02D3141:133b-35: kun du bzang po gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yas
T02D3141:133b-36: pas rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa g-yon pas
T02D3141:134a-1: ba rnams la me tog ma dang bdug spos ma dang mar me ma dang /
T02D3141:134a-2: dri chab ma rnams ni dkar mo dang nag mo dang dmar mo dang /
T02D3141:134a-3: ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis me tog la sogs pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:134a-4: shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o ;
T02D3141:134a-5: / lho ru rdo rje zhags pa sngon po phyag gnyis kyis zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:134a-6: nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:134a-7: byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:134a-8: lha sum cu so bdun po 'di dag kyang gos
T02D3141:134a-9: sna tshogs dang rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis
T02D3141:134a-10: brgyan pa ratna'i cod pan can zhal gcig spyan gnyis
T02D3141:134a-11: pa phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs padma dang zla ba
T02D3141:134a-12: rnams la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o
T02D3141:134a-13: // 'dir rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni rang
T02D3141:134a-14: nyid dang mtshungs pa'i rnam snang gis rgyas btab po
T02D3141:134a-15: // // rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa bzhi la rnam par snang mdzad chen pos so //
T02D3141:134a-16: shar gyi phyogs dang me'i mtshams na gnas pa'i lha rnams la rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so //
T02D3141:134a-17: lho phyogs dang bden bral gyi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la rin chen gtsug tor gyis so ;
T02D3141:134a-18: / nub phyogs dang rlung gi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la padma gtsug tor gyis so //
T02D3141:134a-19: byang phyogs dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la sna tshogs gtsug tor gyis so //
T02D3141:134a-20: 'dir phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas kyi
T02D3141:134a-21: snam bu la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa
T02D3141:134a-22: brgyad po lta'o zhes rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir 'dod
T02D3141:134a-23: yon gyi snam bu rnams la byang chub sems dpa'
T02D3141:134a-24: bcu drug dgod par mi rigs so //
T02D3141:134a-25: 'ga' zhig ni nang gi dkyil 'khor zhes rgyud du
T02D3141:134a-26: gsungs pas phyi rol gyi gzhal yas khang gi nang
T02D3141:134a-27: du gzhal yas khang gnyis pa'o zhes smra'o ;
T02D3141:134a-28: /'ga' zhig tu ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po
T02D3141:134a-29: la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgu gtsug tor
T02D3141:134a-30: dang bcas pa dge slong gi cha lugs 'dzin par
T02D3141:134a-31: gsungs so // padma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba dang /
T02D3141:134a-32: khor yug gi nang du dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas
T02D3141:134b-0: brtsams nas @134b g-yas skor gyis mgrin pa sngon po
T02D3141:134b-1: la sogs pa bskyed par bya ste //
T02D3141:134b-2: de la dbang ldan du glang la mgrin pa sngon
T02D3141:134b-3: po dkar po mchod phyir thogs pa can phyag g-yas
T02D3141:134b-4: gnyis na rdo rje dang mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya
T02D3141:134b-5: g-yon gnyis na rtse gsum dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:134b-6: // mgrin sngon ma mgrin ba sngon po lta bu'o //
T02D3141:134b-7: nam mkha' lding la khyab 'jug nag po g-yas gnyis
T02D3141:134b-8: na dbyug tho dang rdo rje g-yon gnyis na dung
T02D3141:134b-9: dang 'khor lo'o // gser gyi rdo rje ma khyab
T02D3141:134b-10: 'jug lta bu khyad par gser gyi mdog can no
T02D3141:134b-11: dang 'khor lo'o // // rma bya la rdo rje
T02D3141:134b-12: dril bu zhal drug pa dmar ba g-yas pa gnyis
T02D3141:134b-13: na shak ti dang rdo rje g-yon pa gnyis na
T02D3141:134b-14: khyim bya dang rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02D3141:134b-15: rdo rje gzhon nu ma rdo rje dril bu lta bu'o //
T02D3141:134b-16: ngang pa la mi smra rdo rje ser po zhal
T02D3141:134b-17: bzhi pa g-yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang sngags
T02D3141:134b-18: bzla ba'i phreng ba g-yon pa gnyis na dbyug pa
T02D3141:134b-20: rdo rje zhi ba ma tshangs pa lta bu'o//
T02D3141:134b-21: glang po che mche ba drug pa'i dbang po dkar
T02D3141:134b-22: po dang zla ba la rdo rje mtshon cha dkar
T02D3141:134b-23: po rol pa'i kun du bskyod pas gnas pa phyag
T02D3141:134b-24: g-yas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa g-yon pas rdo
T02D3141:134b-25: rje rtse gsum dkur brten pa'o //
T02D3141:134b-26: lha mo rdo rje khu tshur ma ni rdo rje mtshon cha ji lta bu'o //
T02D3141:134b-27: rta bdun gyi shing rta la rdo rje 'khyil ba
T02D3141:134b-28: dmar po khros pa g-yas pa na padma g-yon padma
T02D3141:134b-29: la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:134b-30: rdo rje bdud rtsi ma rdo rje 'khyil pa bzhin no //
T02D3141:134b-31: ngang pa la rdo rje 'od dkar po khro bo
T02D3141:134b-32: phyag g-yas pa rdo rje g-yon pa padma la gnas
T02D3141:134b-34: rdo rje mdog ma rdo rje 'od lta bu'o //
T02D3141:134b-35: ra la rdo rje dmar ser khro bo g-yas kyis
T02D3141:134b-36: rdo rje dmar po 'dzin cing g-yon pas mi bzung
T02D3141:134b-38: rdo rje ske rags ma rdo rje dmar ser bzhin no //
T02D3141:134b-39: padma la rdo rje zhi ba khro bo ser po mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:134b-40: rdo rje zhi ba ma rdo rje zhi ba bzhin no //
T02D3141:134b-41: sbal pa la rdo rje bla ma khro bo ser
T02D3141:134b-42: po g-yas bgrang phreng dang g-yon spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:134b-43: // rdo rje bla ma ma rdo rje bla ma bzhin no //
T02D3141:134b-44: padma la rdo rje pa wa sangs khro bo dkar
T02D3141:134b-45: po g-yas na bgrang phreng dang g-yon na spyi blugs
T02D3141:134b-46: 'dzin pa'o // rdo rje pa wa sangs ma rdo rje pa wa sangs pa bzhin no //
T02D3141:135a-0: rus sbal la rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo nag po g-yas pa @135a * //
T02D3141:135a-1: na rdo rje g-yon pa na dbyug pa'o //
T02D3141:135a-2: rdo rje dbyug pa ma ni rdo rje dbyug pa dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D3141:135a-3: rdo rje sgra gcan khro bo ma dmar nag g-yas
T02D3141:135a-4: pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang g-yon pa nyi ma
T02D3141:135a-5: 'dzin pa'o // rdo rje lha min ma ni rdo rje sgra can dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D3141:135a-6: rdo rje mjug rings khro bo mdog nag po g-yas pas ral gri g-yon pas sprul zhags 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135a-7: rdo rje glu ma rdo rje mjug rings bzhin no //
T02D3141:135a-8: bzhi po 'di dag dang rdo rje zhi ba la
T02D3141:135a-9: sogs pa rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa ltar bdag gis
T02D3141:135a-10: bris so // glang po che la rdo rje glang
T02D3141:135a-11: sna dkar po g-yas rdo rje g-yon pas gshol 'dzin
T02D3141:135a-12: bris so // pa'o // rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang sna bzhin no //
T02D3141:135a-13: de'i khyad par ni g-yon pas kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135a-14: bya ko ki la'i shing rta la rdo rje phreng
T02D3141:135a-15: ba can ljang gu g-yas pa na rdo rje g-yon
T02D3141:135a-16: pa na me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135a-17: rdo rje brtan ma rdo rje phreng ba ji lta
T02D3141:135a-18: ba las khyad par ni phyag g-yon pa na mdung
T02D3141:135a-19: ngo // ne tso'i shing rta la rdo rje dbang
T02D3141:135a-20: can ser po g-yas na rdo rje g-yon pa na
T02D3141:135a-21: chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135a-22: rdo rje dbang can ma rdo rje dbang can dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D3141:135a-23: khyad par ni sku mdog dmar ba'o //
T02D3141:135a-24: sbal pa la rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba dkar po rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135a-25: rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D3141:135a-26: me tog la rdo rje gtun shing ser po g-yas g-yon gyis rdo rje gtun shing 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135a-27: rdo rje pho nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu'o //
T02D3141:135a-28: khyad par ni g-yon pas kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135a-29: ral rdo rje me dmar po g-yas gnyis kyis rdo rje dang go cha g-yon gnyis dbyug to dang /
T02D3141:135a-31: rdo rje 'bar ma rdo rje me lta bu'o //
T02D3141:135a-32: ma he la rdo rje nag po sku mdog nag po rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135a-33: ro langs la rdo rje nag po sku mdog nag mo rdo rje dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135a-34: lhag par klu la rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po
T02D3141:135a-35: phag pa'i zhal rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:135a-36: // mi la rdo rje gdong ma sngon mo phag gdong rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135a-37: chu srin la rdo rje klu dkar po sprul mgo
T02D3141:135a-38: brgyad dang ldan pa g-yas pas rdo rje g-yon pas
T02D3141:135a-39: klu'i zhags pa'o // chu srin la chu srin ma
T02D3141:135b-0: dkar mo sprul mgo brgyad dang ldan @135b pa g-yas
T02D3141:135b-1: pas rdo rje dang g-yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i
T02D3141:135b-3: ri dags la rdo rje rlung sngon po g-yas pas
T02D3141:135b-4: rdo rje g-yon pas rlung sgrib pa'i gos 'dzin pa'o
T02D3141:135b-5: // rdo rje shugs can ma rdo rje rlung lta bu'o //
T02D3141:135b-6: ro langs la rdo rje 'jigs byed sngon po rdo rje dang dbyug to 'dzin pa'o//
T02D3141:135b-7: rdo rje rnam par gtsigs ma rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu'o //
T02D3141:135b-8: khyad par ni g-yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135b-9: byi ba la rdo rje log 'dren dkar po glang
T02D3141:135b-10: po che'i zhal phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis rdo rje
T02D3141:135b-11: dang dgra sta g-yon pa gnyis kyis rtse gsum pa
T02D3141:135b-12: dang / dbyug to 'dzin pa sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa'o //
T02D3141:135b-13: bra ba byi ba la sprul mo sngon ma g-yas pas rdo rje g-yon pas phyags shing 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135b-14: bsdigs ma ljang gu g-yas pas rdo rje g-yon pas ral gri'i bye brag phe ta ka 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135b-15: dpal mo sku mdog ser mo g-yas pas rdo rje g-yon pas padma 'dzin pa /
T02D3141:135b-16: dbyangs can ma dkar mo g-yas na rdo rje g-yon pa ni pi wang 'dzin pa'o /
T02D3141:135b-17: seng ge la bgrod dka' ma ljang gu phyag g-yas
T02D3141:135b-18: pa gnyis na rdo rje dang tsakra g-yon pa gnyis
T02D3141:135b-19: na lde mig dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D3141:135b-20: 'dir mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa'i lha 'di
T02D3141:135b-21: dag gi phyag g-yas pa rnams na ji ltar rigs
T02D3141:135b-22: par rdo rje rtse gsum par rig par bya'o //
T02D3141:135b-23: nub tu rdo rje klu dang nye bar padma la
T02D3141:135b-24: gnas pa'i lha mo gser gyi mdog lta bu phyag
T02D3141:135b-25: gnyis kyis bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa bsnams pa'o
T02D3141:135b-26: // lha ma yin rnams ni sku mdog sna tshogs
T02D3141:135b-27: pa go cha sna tshogs pa bgos nas ral gri
T02D3141:135b-28: 'dzin pa ras bal gyi gdan 'jam pa la gnas
T02D3141:135b-29: // pa'o // klu rnams ni nor bu dang ldan
T02D3141:135b-30: pa'i gdengs ka can btsun mo dang bcas pa'i thal
T02D3141:135b-31: // pa'o // mo sbyar ba'o // khor yug gi
T02D3141:135b-32: phyi rol du me'i mtshams su mnar med pa'i dmyal
T02D3141:135b-33: ba la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D3141:135b-34: bden bral gyi mtshams su yi dags rnams so //
T02D3141:135b-35: rlung gi mtshams su dud 'gro'i 'gro ba rnams so //
T02D3141:135b-36: dbang ldan du mi'i 'gro ba rnams so //
T02D3141:135b-37: rim pa bzhin 'di ni rgyud gzhan gyi tshul gyis bris so //
T02D3141:135b-38: gzhan ni rdo rje 'jigs byed dang nye bar sa'i lha mo dang gnod sbyin rnams so //
T02D3141:136a-1: nye bar lha ma yin rnams so zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par byed do //
T02D3141:136a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i thugs kar zla ba la
T02D3141:136a-3: aom mu ne mu ne ma h'a mu ne ye
T02D3141:136a-4: sv'a h'a / zhes bya ba'i sngags dgod do //
T02D3141:136a-5: de nyid ni snying po'i sngags so //
T02D3141:136a-6: aom na mo bha ga wa te sarba du rga
T02D3141:136a-7: ti ba ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya ta
T02D3141:136a-9: aarha te samya ksam buddh'a ya /

T02D3141:136a-13: dhe sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a
T02D3141:136a-14: h'a / zhes bya ba ni phreng ba'i sngags so //
T02D3141:136a-16: aom sarba bid sarba aa p'a ya ga ti ga
T02D3141:136a-17: ha na bi sho dha ni h'um ho: phat ces
T02D3141:136a-18: bya ba ni las thams cad pa'i sngags so //
T02D3141:136a-19: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes gzhan dag go //
T02D3141:136a-20: 'byung po 'dul byed kyi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje
T02D3141:136a-21: gur gyi nang du ri rab kyi steng du sna
T02D3141:136a-22: tshogs padma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i rdo rje rgya
T02D3141:136a-23: gram gyi lte ba'i dbus su gzhal yas khang gi
T02D3141:136a-24: lte ba la glang po che'i rgyal po'i steng ngam
T02D3141:136a-25: de med kyang rung ste sna tshogs padma dang zla
T02D3141:136a-26: ba la 'byung po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar
T02D3141:136a-27: po zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i 'od zer dang
T02D3141:136a-28: ldan pa ral pa'i thor cog can sma ra dmar
T02D3141:136a-29: ser thod pa lnga dang ldan pa mig gsum pa
T02D3141:136a-30: mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung ba gsus pa
T02D3141:136a-31: 'phyang ba sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can stag
T02D3141:136a-32: gi pags pas phyed dkris pa lag pa bzhi pa

T02D3141:136a-34: pa gnyis kyis thod pa dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa

T02D3141:136a-37: mdog sngon po thod pa lngas mtshan pa'i cod pan

T02D3141:136a-39: gyen du 'bar bas bcings pa gos sngon po gon
T02D3141:136a-40: pa zhal mche ba gtsigs pa spyan gsum dmar ba

T02D3141:136a-44: zhags pa 'dzin pa phyag gnyis kyis phyag rgya mdzad

T02D3141:136b-0: mthe chung dang gung mo yang mthe bong rgan pos mnan par @136b bya'o zhes pa 'di gsungs so //

T02D3141:136b-7: phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag gnyis kyis dpung par rigs ldan phug ron gyi mdog lta bus brgyan pa /

T02D3141:136b-35: 'dzin pa'o // pa 'dzin pa'o// mer nyi ma'i dkyil

T02D3141:137a-3: zla bar bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D3141:137a-4: rlung du zla ba'i steng du dga' byed dbang phyug
T02D3141:137a-5: ser po gar byed cing spyi bor zla ba phyed
T02D3141:137a-6: ba can sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan

T02D3141:137a-12: nub tu zla ba la zla ba mo dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa'o //

T02D3141:137a-16: bden bral du zla ba la dbyangs can ma ljang gu bi wang gi sgra sgrogs pa'o //

T02D3141:137a-28: na bza' ser po man bas pa phyag g-yas pas
T02D3141:137a-29: thod pas mtshan pa'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa /
